trans-unit.source: Provides methods for creating, manipulating, searching, and sorting arrays, thereby serving as the base class for all arrays in the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: 提供建立、管理、搜尋和排序陣列的方法，可在 Common Language Runtime 時做為所有陣列的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> class is not part of the <xref:System.Collections> namespaces.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>類別不是屬於<xref:System.Collections>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: However, it is still considered a collection because it is based on the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 不過，它仍然是集合因為它根據<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> class is the base class for language implementations that support arrays.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>類別是支援陣列的語言實作的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: However, only the system and compilers can derive explicitly from the <xref:System.Array> class.
trans-unit.target: 不過，只有系統和編譯器可以明確地從衍生<xref:System.Array>類別。

trans-unit.source: Users should employ the array constructs provided by the language.
trans-unit.target: 使用者應該使用的語言所提供的陣列建構。

trans-unit.source: An element is a value in an <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 項目是中的值<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The length of an <xref:System.Array> is the total number of elements it can contain.
trans-unit.target: 長度<xref:System.Array>是它可以包含的元素總數。

trans-unit.source: The lower bound of an <xref:System.Array> is the index of its first element.
trans-unit.target: 下限為<xref:System.Array>是其第一個元素的索引。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Array> can have any lower bound, but it has a lower bound of zero by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>可以有任何下限，但其下限為零的預設值。

trans-unit.source: A different lower bound can be defined when creating an instance of the <xref:System.Array> class using <xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A>.A multidimensional <xref:System.Array> can have different bounds for each dimension.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體時，就可以定義其他下限<xref:System.Array>類別使用<xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A>。多維度<xref:System.Array>可以有不同的繫結，每個維度。

trans-unit.source: An array can have a maximum of 32 dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 陣列可以有 32 個維度的最大值。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the classes in the <xref:System.Collections> namespaces, <xref:System.Array> has a fixed capacity.
trans-unit.target: 不同於在類別<xref:System.Collections>命名空間，<xref:System.Array>具有固定的容量。

trans-unit.source: To increase the capacity, you must create a new <xref:System.Array> object with the required capacity, copy the elements from the old <xref:System.Array> object to the new one, and delete the old <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 若要增加容量，您必須建立新<xref:System.Array>物件具有所需容量，請複製項目從舊<xref:System.Array>物件到新的專案，並刪除舊<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: By default, the maximum size of an <xref:System.Array> is 2 gigabytes (GB).
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，最大<xref:System.Array>為 2 gb (GB)。

trans-unit.source: In a 64-bit environment, you can avoid the size restriction by setting the `enabled` attribute of the [gcAllowVeryLargeObjects](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element.md) configuration element to `true` in the run-time environment.
trans-unit.target: 在 64 位元環境中，您可以避免大小限制，藉由設定`enabled`屬性[gcAllowVeryLargeObjects](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element.md)組態項目`true`在執行階段環境中。

trans-unit.source: However, the array will still be limited to a total of 4 billion elements, and to a maximum index of 0X7FEFFFFF in any given dimension (0X7FFFFFC7 for byte arrays and arrays of single-byte structures).
trans-unit.target: 不過，陣列仍會限制為 4 10 億個項目的總計和 0X7FEFFFFF 中任何指定的維度 (0X7FFFFFC7 位元組陣列和陣列的單一位元組結構) 的最大索引。

trans-unit.source: Single-dimensional arrays implement the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList%601?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection%601?displayProperty=nameWithType> generic interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 一維陣列實作<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>，<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>泛型介面。

trans-unit.source: The implementations are provided to arrays at run time, and as a result, the generic interfaces do not appear in the declaration syntax for the <xref:System.Array> class.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中提供實作在執行階段，以及泛型介面如此一來，未出現在宣告語法<xref:System.Array>類別。

trans-unit.source: In addition, there are no reference topics for interface members that are accessible only by casting an array to the generic interface type (explicit interface implementations).
trans-unit.target: 此外，還有介面的成員可存取只能透過將轉型為泛型介面型別 （明確介面實作） 的陣列沒有參考主題。

trans-unit.source: The key thing to be aware of when you cast an array to one of these interfaces is that members which add, insert, or remove elements throw <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 留意這些介面的其中一個陣列的轉換時的重點是成員的加入，請插入或移除項目 throw <xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type> objects provide information about array type declarations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type> 物件會提供資訊的陣列型別宣告。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array> objects with the same array type share the same <xref:System.Type> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array> 具有相同的陣列型別的物件共用相同<xref:System.Type>物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.IsArray%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Type.GetElementType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> might not return the expected results with <xref:System.Array> because if an array is cast to the type <xref:System.Array>, the result is an object, not an array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsArray%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 和<xref:System.Type.GetElementType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>可能不會傳回預期的結果與<xref:System.Array>因為如果陣列轉換成類型<xref:System.Array>，結果是一個物件，而非陣列。

trans-unit.source: That is, `typeof(System.Array).IsArray` returns `false`, and `typeof(System.Array).GetElementType` returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，`typeof(System.Array).IsArray`傳回`false`，和`typeof(System.Array).GetElementType`傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method copies elements not only between arrays of the same type but also between standard arrays of different types; it handles type casting automatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會複製項目相同的類型陣列之間的不只但不同類型的標準陣列之間; 它會處理類型會自動轉換。

trans-unit.source: Some methods, such as <xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A>, <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A>, <xref:System.Array.CopyTo%2A>, <xref:System.Array.GetValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Array.SetValue%2A>, provide overloads that accept 64-bit integers as parameters to accommodate large capacity arrays.
trans-unit.target: 某些方法，例如<xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A>， <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A>， <xref:System.Array.CopyTo%2A>， <xref:System.Array.GetValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Array.SetValue%2A>，提供多載，可接受參數，以容納陣列大容量為 64 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array.LongLength%2A> and <xref:System.Array.GetLongLength%2A> return 64-bit integers indicating the length of the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.LongLength%2A> 和<xref:System.Array.GetLongLength%2A>傳回 64 位元整數，指出陣列的長度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> is not guaranteed to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>不保證排序。

trans-unit.source: You must sort the <xref:System.Array> prior to performing operations (such as <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A>) that require the <xref:System.Array> to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 必須排序<xref:System.Array>之前執行的作業 (例如<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A>) 需要的<xref:System.Array>來排序。

trans-unit.source: Using an <xref:System.Array> object of pointers in native code is not supported and will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> for several methods.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Array>的原生程式碼中的指標物件不支援，將會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>數個方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> copies elements between an array of type integer and an array of type <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何<xref:System.Array.Copy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>項目型別整數的陣列型別的陣列之間複製<xref:System.Object>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates and initializes an <xref:System.Array> and displays its properties and its elements.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化<xref:System.Array>，並顯示其屬性和其項目。

trans-unit.source: Public static (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 公用靜態 (<see langword="Shared" />在 Visual Basic 中) 這種類型的成員都具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for an <see cref="T:System.Array" />; however, .NET Framework classes based on <see cref="T:System.Array" /> provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the <see cref="P:System.Array.SyncRoot" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 此實作不會提供同步處理 （安全執行緒） 包裝函式<see cref="T:System.Array" />; 不過，.NET Framework 類別根據<see cref="T:System.Array" />提供自己的集合的同步化的版本<see cref="P:System.Array.SyncRoot" />屬性。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based array to wrap in a read-only <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 要在唯讀 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> 包裝函式中包裝的以零為起始的一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only wrapper for the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之陣列的唯讀包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> wrapper for the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 指定之陣列的唯讀 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> 包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: To prevent any modifications to the array, expose the array only through this wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免陣列的任何修改，公開的陣列，只能透過這個包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: The following example wraps an array in a read-only <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例中的唯讀包裝陣列<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches a one-dimensional sorted <see cref="T:System.Array" /> for a value, using a binary search algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用二進位搜尋演算法，在一維且已排序的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中搜尋值。

trans-unit.source: The sorted one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之已排序的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的物件。

trans-unit.source: Searches an entire one-dimensional sorted array for a specific element, using the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface implemented by each element of the array and by the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 使用陣列每個項目和指定物件所實作的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面，在整個一維已排序的陣列中搜尋特定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified <paramref name="value" /> in the specified <paramref name="array" />, if <paramref name="value" /> is found; otherwise, a negative number.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到 <paramref name="value" />，則為指定的 <paramref name="array" /> 中指定的 <paramref name="value" /> 索引；否則為負數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is not found and <paramref name="value" /> is less than one or more elements in <paramref name="array" />, the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of the index of the first element that is larger than <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到 <paramref name="value" /> 且 <paramref name="value" /> 小於 <paramref name="array" /> 的一或多個項目，傳回的負數是大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的第一個項目索引的位元補數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is not found and <paramref name="value" /> is greater than all elements in <paramref name="array" />, the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of (the index of the last element plus 1).
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到 <paramref name="value" /> 且 <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <paramref name="array" /> 的所有項目，傳回的負數是 (最後一個項目索引加 1) 的位元補數。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called with a non-sorted <paramref name="array" />, the return value can be incorrect and a negative number could be returned, even if <paramref name="value" /> is present in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果以未排序的 <paramref name="array" /> 來呼叫這個方法，傳回值會不正確且可能傳回負數，即使 <paramref name="value" /> 出現在 <paramref name="array" /> 中也一樣。

trans-unit.source: This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不支援搜尋的陣列，其中包含負值的索引。

trans-unit.source: `array` must be sorted before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: `array` 呼叫這個方法之前，必須先排序。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Array> does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array>不包含指定的值，此方法會傳回負整數。

trans-unit.source: You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將套用的位元補數 」 運算子 (~ 在 C# 中，`Not`在 Visual Basic 中) 設為負數的結果來產生索引。

trans-unit.source: If this index is one greater than the upper bound of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array.
trans-unit.target: 此索引大於陣列的上限是否有任何元素大於`value`陣列中。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它是第一個元素大於索引`value`。

trans-unit.source: Either `value` or every element of `array` must implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface, which is used for comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 可能是`value`或每個項目`array`必須實作<xref:System.IComparable>介面，用於比較。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the <xref:System.IComparable> implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`已必須以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序<xref:System.IComparable>實作; 否則結果可能不正確。

trans-unit.source: If`value` does not implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface, the elements of `array` are not tested for <xref:System.IComparable> before the search begins.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`未實作<xref:System.IComparable>介面的項目`array`不需要測試的<xref:System.IComparable>之前開始搜尋。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if the search encounters an element that does not implement <xref:System.IComparable>.
trans-unit.target: 如果搜尋遇到未實作的項目，會擲回例外狀況<xref:System.IComparable>。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate elements are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 允許重複的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Array> contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array>包含多個元素等於`value`，方法會傳回的其中一個相符項目，並不一定是第一個索引。

trans-unit.source: `null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception.
trans-unit.target: `null` 一定要與其他任何參考類型; 比較因此，比較`null`並不會產生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate <xref:System.IComparable> implementation, even if `value` is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目測試，`value`傳遞至適當<xref:System.IComparable>實作，即使`value`是`null`。

trans-unit.source: That is, the <xref:System.IComparable> implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，<xref:System.IComparable>實作可讓您決定如何為指定項目與比較`null`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A> to locate a specific object in an <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A>找不到中的特定物件<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The array is created with its elements in ascending sort order.
trans-unit.target: 建立陣列的元素以遞增排序次序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A> method requires the array to be sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A>方法必須要以遞增順序排序的陣列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is of a type that is not compatible with the elements of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的類型與 <paramref name="array" /> 項目不相容。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface, and the search encounters an element that does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不會實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面，且搜尋時遇到未實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面的項目。

trans-unit.source: The sorted one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之已排序的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> implementation to use when comparing elements.
trans-unit.target: 比較項目時所要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" /> to use the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each element.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> 表示會使用每個項目的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: Searches an entire one-dimensional sorted array for a value using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 介面，在整個一維已排序的陣列中搜尋值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified <paramref name="value" /> in the specified <paramref name="array" />, if <paramref name="value" /> is found; otherwise, a negative number.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到 <paramref name="value" />，則為指定的 <paramref name="array" /> 中指定的 <paramref name="value" /> 索引；否則為負數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is not found and <paramref name="value" /> is less than one or more elements in <paramref name="array" />, the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of the index of the first element that is larger than <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到 <paramref name="value" /> 且 <paramref name="value" /> 小於 <paramref name="array" /> 的一或多個項目，傳回的負數是大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的第一個項目索引的位元補數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is not found and <paramref name="value" /> is greater than all elements in <paramref name="array" />, the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of (the index of the last element plus 1).
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到 <paramref name="value" /> 且 <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <paramref name="array" /> 的所有項目，傳回的負數是 (最後一個項目索引加 1) 的位元補數。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called with a non-sorted <paramref name="array" />, the return value can be incorrect and a negative number could be returned, even if <paramref name="value" /> is present in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果以未排序的 <paramref name="array" /> 來呼叫這個方法，傳回值會不正確且可能傳回負數，即使 <paramref name="value" /> 出現在 <paramref name="array" /> 中也一樣。

trans-unit.source: This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不支援搜尋的陣列，其中包含負值的索引。

trans-unit.source: `array` must be sorted before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: `array` 呼叫這個方法之前，必須先排序。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Array> does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array>不包含指定的值，此方法會傳回負整數。

trans-unit.source: You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將套用的位元補數 」 運算子 (~ 在 C# 中，`Not`在 Visual Basic 中) 設為負數的結果來產生索引。

trans-unit.source: If this index is one greater than the upper bound of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array.
trans-unit.target: 此索引大於陣列的上限是否有任何元素大於`value`陣列中。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它是第一個元素大於索引`value`。

trans-unit.source: The comparer customizes how the elements are compared.
trans-unit.target: 比較子自訂元素的比較方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use a <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer?displayProperty=nameWithType> as the comparer to perform case-insensitive string searches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用<xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer?displayProperty=nameWithType>為要執行不區分大小寫的字串搜尋的比較子。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is not `null`, the elements of `array` are compared to the specified value using the specified <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`不`null`的項目`array`指定使用指定的值比較<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>實作。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by `comparer`; otherwise, the result might be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`已必須以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序`comparer`; 否則結果可能不正確。

trans-unit.source: If`comparer` is `null`, the comparison is done using the <xref:System.IComparable> implementation provided by the element itself or by the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`，進行比較使用<xref:System.IComparable>實作所提供項目本身，或指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the <xref:System.IComparable> implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`已必須以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序<xref:System.IComparable>實作; 否則結果可能不正確。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null` and `value` does not implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface, the elements of `array` are not tested for <xref:System.IComparable> before the search begins.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`和`value`未實作<xref:System.IComparable>介面的項目`array`不需要測試的<xref:System.IComparable>之前開始搜尋。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if the search encounters an element that does not implement <xref:System.IComparable>.
trans-unit.target: 如果搜尋遇到未實作的項目，會擲回例外狀況<xref:System.IComparable>。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate elements are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 允許重複的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Array> contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array>包含多個元素等於`value`，方法會傳回的其中一個相符項目，並不一定是第一個索引。

trans-unit.source: `null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception.
trans-unit.target: `null` 一定要與其他任何參考類型; 比較因此，比較`null`並不會產生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate <xref:System.IComparable> implementation, even if `value` is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目測試，`value`傳遞至適當<xref:System.IComparable>實作，即使`value`是`null`。

trans-unit.source: That is, the <xref:System.IComparable> implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，<xref:System.IComparable>實作可讓您決定如何為指定項目與比較`null`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, and <paramref name="value" /> is of a type that is not compatible with the elements of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，且 <paramref name="value" /> 的類型與 <paramref name="array" /> 項目不相容。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, <paramref name="value" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface, and the search encounters an element that does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，<paramref name="value" /> 不會實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面，且搜尋時遇到未實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面的項目。

trans-unit.source: The sorted one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之已排序的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the range to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋範圍的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The length of the range to search.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋範圍的長度。

trans-unit.source: The object to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的物件。

trans-unit.source: Searches a range of elements in a one-dimensional sorted array for a value, using the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface implemented by each element of the array and by the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 使用陣列的每個項目和指定之值所實作的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面，在已排序的一維陣列內某個範圍的項目中搜尋值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified <paramref name="value" /> in the specified <paramref name="array" />, if <paramref name="value" /> is found; otherwise, a negative number.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到 <paramref name="value" />，則為指定的 <paramref name="array" /> 中指定的 <paramref name="value" /> 索引；否則為負數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is not found and <paramref name="value" /> is less than one or more elements in <paramref name="array" />, the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of the index of the first element that is larger than <paramref name="value" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is not found and <paramref name="value" /> is greater than all elements in <paramref name="array" />, the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of (the index of the last element plus 1).
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到 <paramref name="value" /> 且 <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <paramref name="array" /> 的所有項目，傳回的負數是 (最後一個項目索引加 1) 的位元補數。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called with a non-sorted <paramref name="array" />, the return value can be incorrect and a negative number could be returned, even if <paramref name="value" /> is present in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果以未排序的 <paramref name="array" /> 來呼叫這個方法，傳回值會不正確且可能傳回負數，即使 <paramref name="value" /> 出現在 <paramref name="array" /> 中也一樣。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法不支援搜尋的陣列，其中包含負值的索引。

trans-unit.source: `array` must be sorted before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: `array` 呼叫這個方法之前，必須先排序。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Array> does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array>不包含指定的值，此方法會傳回負整數。

trans-unit.source: You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將套用的位元補數 」 運算子 (~ 在 C# 中，`Not`在 Visual Basic 中) 設為負數的結果來產生索引。

trans-unit.target: 此索引大於陣列的上限是否有任何元素大於`value`陣列中。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它是第一個元素大於索引`value`。

trans-unit.source: Either `value` or every element of `array` must implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface, which is used for comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 可能是`value`或每個項目`array`必須實作<xref:System.IComparable>介面，用於比較。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the <xref:System.IComparable> implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect.

trans-unit.source: If `value` does not implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface, the elements of `array` are not tested for <xref:System.IComparable> before the search begins.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`未實作<xref:System.IComparable>介面的項目`array`不需要測試的<xref:System.IComparable>之前開始搜尋。

trans-unit.target: 如果搜尋遇到未實作的項目，會擲回例外狀況<xref:System.IComparable>。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate elements are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 允許重複的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Array> contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one.

trans-unit.target: `null` 一定要與其他任何參考類型; 比較因此，比較`null`並不會產生例外狀況。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than the lower bound of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 <paramref name="array" /> 的下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不會實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面，且搜尋時遇到未實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> implementation to use when comparing elements.

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" /> to use the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each element.

trans-unit.target: 也就是說，<xref:System.IComparable>實作可讓您決定如何為指定項目與比較`null`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than the lower bound of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 <paramref name="array" /> 的下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="length" /> do not specify a valid range in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="length" /> 未指定 <paramref name="array" /> 中的有效範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, and <paramref name="value" /> is of a type that is not compatible with the elements of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，且 <paramref name="value" /> 的類型與 <paramref name="array" /> 項目不相容。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, <paramref name="value" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface, and the search encounters an element that does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，<paramref name="value" /> 不會實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面，且搜尋時遇到未實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面的項目。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The sorted one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> (其以零為起始且已排序)。

trans-unit.source: The object to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的物件。

trans-unit.source: Searches an entire one-dimensional sorted array for a specific element, using the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface implemented by each element of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> and by the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的每個項目和指定之物件所實作的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型介面，在整個已排序的一維陣列中搜尋特定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified <paramref name="value" /> in the specified <paramref name="array" />, if <paramref name="value" /> is found; otherwise, a negative number.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到 <paramref name="value" />，則為指定的 <paramref name="array" /> 中指定的 <paramref name="value" /> 索引；否則為負數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is not found and <paramref name="value" /> is less than one or more elements in <paramref name="array" />, the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of the index of the first element that is larger than <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到 <paramref name="value" /> 且 <paramref name="value" /> 小於 <paramref name="array" /> 的一或多個項目，傳回的負數是大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的第一個項目索引的位元補數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is not found and <paramref name="value" /> is greater than all elements in <paramref name="array" />, the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of (the index of the last element plus 1).
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到 <paramref name="value" /> 且 <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <paramref name="array" /> 的所有項目，傳回的負數是 (最後一個項目索引加 1) 的位元補數。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called with a non-sorted <paramref name="array" />, the return value can be incorrect and a negative number could be returned, even if <paramref name="value" /> is present in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果以未排序的 <paramref name="array" /> 來呼叫這個方法，傳回值會不正確且可能傳回負數，即使 <paramref name="value" /> 出現在 <paramref name="array" /> 中也一樣。

trans-unit.source: This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不支援搜尋的陣列，其中包含負值的索引。

trans-unit.source: `array` must be sorted before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: `array` 呼叫這個方法之前，必須先排序。

trans-unit.source: If `array` does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果`array`不包含指定的值，此方法會傳回負整數。

trans-unit.source: You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將套用的位元補數 」 運算子 (~ 在 C# 中，`Not`在 Visual Basic 中) 設為負數的結果來產生索引。

trans-unit.source: If this index is equal to the size of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array.
trans-unit.target: 這個索引等於陣列的大小，如果有任何項目大於`value`陣列中。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它是第一個元素大於索引`value`。

trans-unit.source: `T` must implement the <xref:System.IComparable%601> generic interface, which is used for comparisons.
trans-unit.target: `T` 必須實作<xref:System.IComparable%601>泛型介面，用於比較。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the <xref:System.IComparable%601> implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`已必須以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序<xref:System.IComparable%601>實作; 否則結果可能不正確。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate elements are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 允許重複的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Array> contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array>包含多個元素等於`value`，方法會傳回的其中一個相符項目，並不一定是第一個索引。

trans-unit.source: `null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception.
trans-unit.target: `null` 一定要與其他任何參考類型; 比較因此，比較`null`並不會產生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate <xref:System.IComparable%601> implementation, even if `value` is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目測試，`value`傳遞至適當<xref:System.IComparable%601>實作，即使`value`是`null`。

trans-unit.source: That is, the <xref:System.IComparable%601> implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，<xref:System.IComparable%601>實作可讓您決定如何為指定項目與比較`null`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%29> generic method overload and the <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29> generic method overload.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%29>泛型方法的多載而<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29>泛型方法的多載。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, in no particular order.
trans-unit.target: 建立字串陣列，不依特定順序。

trans-unit.source: The array is displayed, sorted, and displayed again.
trans-unit.target: 陣列會顯示、 已排序，並且會再次顯示。

trans-unit.source: Arrays must be sorted in order to use the <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 必須排序陣列，才能使用<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The calls to the <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A> and <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A> generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫<xref:System.Array.Sort%2A>和<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A>泛型方法看起來不任何不同於呼叫其非泛型對應項目，因為 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 推斷的第一個引數類型的泛型型別參數的型別。

trans-unit.source: If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要檢查的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，您可以查看呼叫泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29> generic method overload is then used to search for two strings, one that is not in the array and one that is.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29>泛型方法的多載然後來搜尋兩個字串，而非在陣列與其中一個，為。

trans-unit.source: The array and the return value of the <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A> method are passed to the `ShowWhere` generic method, which displays the index value if the string is found, and otherwise the elements the search string would fall between if it were in the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列和傳回值<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A>方法會傳遞至`ShowWhere`泛型的方法，如果找到字串，否則項目搜尋字串會介於陣列中時顯示的索引值。

trans-unit.source: The index is negative if the string is not in the array, so the `ShowWhere` method takes the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor`-1 in Visual Basic) to obtain the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string.
trans-unit.target: 索引是負值，如果字串不是陣列，所以`ShowWhere`方法會採用的位元補數 (~ 運算子，在 C# 和 Visual c + +，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的為-1) 取得第一個元素大於搜尋清單中的索引 str正執行。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="T" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="T" /> 不實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型介面。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The sorted one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> (其以零為起始且已排序)。

trans-unit.source: The object to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> implementation to use when comparing elements.
trans-unit.target: 比較項目時所要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" /> to use the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> implementation of each element.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> 表示會使用每個項目的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: Searches an entire one-dimensional sorted array for a value using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> 泛型介面，在整個已排序的一維陣列中搜尋值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified <paramref name="value" /> in the specified <paramref name="array" />, if <paramref name="value" /> is found; otherwise, a negative number.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到 <paramref name="value" />，則為指定的 <paramref name="array" /> 中指定的 <paramref name="value" /> 索引；否則為負數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is not found and <paramref name="value" /> is less than one or more elements in <paramref name="array" />, the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of the index of the first element that is larger than <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到 <paramref name="value" /> 且 <paramref name="value" /> 小於 <paramref name="array" /> 的一或多個項目，傳回的負數是大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的第一個項目索引的位元補數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is not found and <paramref name="value" /> is greater than all elements in <paramref name="array" />, the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of (the index of the last element plus 1).
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到 <paramref name="value" /> 且 <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <paramref name="array" /> 的所有項目，傳回的負數是 (最後一個項目索引加 1) 的位元補數。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called with a non-sorted <paramref name="array" />, the return value can be incorrect and a negative number could be returned, even if <paramref name="value" /> is present in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果以未排序的 <paramref name="array" /> 來呼叫這個方法，傳回值會不正確且可能傳回負數，即使 <paramref name="value" /> 出現在 <paramref name="array" /> 中也一樣。

trans-unit.source: This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不支援搜尋的陣列，其中包含負值的索引。

trans-unit.source: `array` must be sorted before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: `array` 呼叫這個方法之前，必須先排序。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Array> does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array>不包含指定的值，此方法會傳回負整數。

trans-unit.source: You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將套用的位元補數 」 運算子 (~ 在 C# 中，`Not`在 Visual Basic 中) 設為負數的結果來產生索引。

trans-unit.source: If this index is equal to the size of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array.
trans-unit.target: 這個索引等於陣列的大小，如果有任何項目大於`value`陣列中。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它是第一個元素大於索引`value`。

trans-unit.source: The comparer customizes how the elements are compared.
trans-unit.target: 比較子自訂元素的比較方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use a <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer?displayProperty=nameWithType> as the comparer to perform case-insensitive string searches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用<xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer?displayProperty=nameWithType>為要執行不區分大小寫的字串搜尋的比較子。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is not `null`, the elements of `array` are compared to the specified value using the specified <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer%601> generic interface implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`不`null`的項目`array`指定使用指定的值比較<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer%601>泛型介面實作。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by `comparer`; otherwise, the result might be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`已必須以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序`comparer`; 否則結果可能不正確。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null`, the comparison is done using the <xref:System.IComparable%601> generic interface implementation provided by `T`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`，進行比較使用<xref:System.IComparable%601>所提供的泛型介面實作`T`。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the <xref:System.IComparable%601> implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`已必須以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序<xref:System.IComparable%601>實作; 否則結果可能不正確。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null` and `value` does not implement the <xref:System.IComparable%601> generic interface, the elements of `array` are not tested for <xref:System.IComparable%601> before the search begins.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`和`value`未實作<xref:System.IComparable%601>泛型介面的項目`array`不需要測試的<xref:System.IComparable%601>之前開始搜尋。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if the search encounters an element that does not implement <xref:System.IComparable%601>.
trans-unit.target: 如果搜尋遇到未實作的項目，會擲回例外狀況<xref:System.IComparable%601>。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate elements are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 允許重複的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Array> contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array>包含多個元素等於`value`，方法會傳回的其中一個相符項目，並不一定是第一個索引。

trans-unit.source: `null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception.
trans-unit.target: `null` 一定要與其他任何參考類型; 比較因此，比較`null`並不會產生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate <xref:System.IComparable%601> implementation, even if `value` is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目測試，`value`傳遞至適當<xref:System.IComparable%601>實作，即使`value`是`null`。

trans-unit.source: That is, the <xref:System.IComparable%601> implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，<xref:System.IComparable%601>實作可讓您決定如何為指定項目與比較`null`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overload and the <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overload.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法的多載而<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法的多載。

trans-unit.source: The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer<string>` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer<String^>` in Visual C++) generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例定義的替代的比較子字串，名為`ReverseCompare`，它會實作`IComparer<string>`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中`IComparer<String^>`Visual c + +) 泛型介面。

trans-unit.source: The comparer calls the <xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29> method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high.
trans-unit.target: 比較子的呼叫<xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29>方法，使字串排序高-到-低而不是低到高反轉比較元的順序。

trans-unit.source: The array is displayed, sorted, and displayed again.
trans-unit.target: 陣列會顯示、 已排序，並且會再次顯示。

trans-unit.source: Arrays must be sorted in order to use the <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 必須排序陣列，才能使用<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The calls to the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> and <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>和<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法看起來不任何不同於呼叫其非泛型對應項目，因為 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 推斷的第一個引數類型的泛型型別參數的型別。

trans-unit.source: If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要檢查的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，您可以查看呼叫泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overload is then used to search for two strings, one that is not in the array and one that is.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法的多載然後來搜尋兩個字串，而非在陣列與其中一個，為。

trans-unit.source: The array and the return value of the <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> method are passed to the `ShowWhere` generic method, which displays the index value if the string is found, and otherwise the elements the search string would fall between if it were in the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列和傳回值<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法會傳遞至`ShowWhere`泛型的方法，如果找到字串，否則項目搜尋字串會介於陣列中時顯示的索引值。

trans-unit.source: The index is negative if the string is not n the array, so the `ShowWhere` method takes the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) to obtain the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string.
trans-unit.target: 索引是負值，如果字串不是 n 陣列，所以`ShowWhere`方法會採用的位元補數 (~ 運算子，在 C# 和 Visual c + +，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的為-1) 取得第一個元素大於搜尋 stri 清單中的索引ng。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, and <paramref name="value" /> is of a type that is not compatible with the elements of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，且 <paramref name="value" /> 的類型與 <paramref name="array" /> 的項目不相容。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, and <paramref name="T" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，且 <paramref name="T" /> 未實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型介面

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The sorted one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的已排序且為一維之以零為起始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the range to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋範圍的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The length of the range to search.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋範圍的長度。

trans-unit.source: The object to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的物件。

trans-unit.source: Searches a range of elements in a one-dimensional sorted array for a value, using the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface implemented by each element of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> and by the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的每個項目和指定值所實作的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型介面，在一維已排序的陣列內某個範圍的項目中搜尋值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified <paramref name="value" /> in the specified <paramref name="array" />, if <paramref name="value" /> is found; otherwise, a negative number.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到 <paramref name="value" />，則為指定的 <paramref name="array" /> 中指定的 <paramref name="value" /> 索引；否則為負數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is not found and <paramref name="value" /> is less than one or more elements in <paramref name="array" />, the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of the index of the first element that is larger than <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到 <paramref name="value" /> 且 <paramref name="value" /> 小於 <paramref name="array" /> 的一或多個項目，傳回的負數是大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的第一個項目索引的位元補數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is not found and <paramref name="value" /> is greater than all elements in <paramref name="array" />, the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of (the index of the last element plus 1).
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到 <paramref name="value" /> 且 <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <paramref name="array" /> 的所有項目，傳回的負數是 (最後一個項目索引加 1) 的位元補數。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called with a non-sorted <paramref name="array" />, the return value can be incorrect and a negative number could be returned, even if <paramref name="value" /> is present in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果以未排序的 <paramref name="array" /> 來呼叫這個方法，傳回值會不正確且可能傳回負數，即使 <paramref name="value" /> 出現在 <paramref name="array" /> 中也一樣。

trans-unit.source: This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不支援搜尋的陣列，其中包含負值的索引。

trans-unit.source: `array` must be sorted before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: `array` 呼叫這個方法之前，必須先排序。

trans-unit.source: If the array does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果陣列未包含指定的值，則方法會傳回負整數。

trans-unit.source: You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將套用的位元補數 」 運算子 (~ 在 C# 中，`Not`在 Visual Basic 中) 設為負數的結果來產生索引。

trans-unit.source: If this index is equal to the size of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array.
trans-unit.target: 這個索引等於陣列的大小，如果有任何項目大於`value`陣列中。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它是第一個元素大於索引`value`。

trans-unit.source: `T` must implement the <xref:System.IComparable%601> generic interface, which is used for comparisons.
trans-unit.target: `T` 必須實作<xref:System.IComparable%601>泛型介面，用於比較。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the <xref:System.IComparable%601> implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`已必須以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序<xref:System.IComparable%601>實作; 否則結果可能不正確。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate elements are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 允許重複的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Array> contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array>包含多個元素等於`value`，方法會傳回的其中一個相符項目，並不一定是第一個索引。

trans-unit.source: `null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception.
trans-unit.target: `null` 一定要與其他任何參考類型; 比較因此，比較`null`並不會產生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate <xref:System.IComparable%601> implementation, even if `value` is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目測試，`value`傳遞至適當<xref:System.IComparable%601>實作，即使`value`是`null`。

trans-unit.source: That is, the <xref:System.IComparable%601> implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，<xref:System.IComparable%601>實作可讓您決定如何為指定項目與比較`null`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than the lower bound of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 <paramref name="array" /> 的下限。

<paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="length" /> do not specify a valid range in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="length" /> 未指定 <paramref name="array" /> 中的有效範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" /> is of a type that is not compatible with the elements of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的類型與 <paramref name="array" /> 項目不相容。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="T" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="T" /> 不實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型介面。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The sorted one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的已排序且為一維之以零為起始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the range to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋範圍的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The length of the range to search.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋範圍的長度。

trans-unit.source: The object to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> implementation to use when comparing elements.
trans-unit.target: 比較項目時所要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" /> to use the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> implementation of each element.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> 表示會使用每個項目的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: Searches a range of elements in a one-dimensional sorted array for a value, using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> 泛型介面，在已排序的一維陣列內某範圍的項目中搜尋值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified <paramref name="value" /> in the specified <paramref name="array" />, if <paramref name="value" /> is found; otherwise, a negative number.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到 <paramref name="value" />，則為指定的 <paramref name="array" /> 中指定的 <paramref name="value" /> 索引；否則為負數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is not found and <paramref name="value" /> is less than one or more elements in <paramref name="array" />, the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of the index of the first element that is larger than <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到 <paramref name="value" /> 且 <paramref name="value" /> 小於 <paramref name="array" /> 的一或多個項目，傳回的負數是大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的第一個項目索引的位元補數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is not found and <paramref name="value" /> is greater than all elements in <paramref name="array" />, the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of (the index of the last element plus 1).
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到 <paramref name="value" /> 且 <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <paramref name="array" /> 的所有項目，傳回的負數是 (最後一個項目索引加 1) 的位元補數。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called with a non-sorted <paramref name="array" />, the return value can be incorrect and a negative number could be returned, even if <paramref name="value" /> is present in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果以未排序的 <paramref name="array" /> 來呼叫這個方法，傳回值會不正確且可能傳回負數，即使 <paramref name="value" /> 出現在 <paramref name="array" /> 中也一樣。

trans-unit.source: This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不支援搜尋的陣列，其中包含負值的索引。

trans-unit.source: `array` must be sorted before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: `array` 呼叫這個方法之前，必須先排序。

trans-unit.source: If the array does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果陣列未包含指定的值，則方法會傳回負整數。

trans-unit.source: You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將套用的位元補數 」 運算子 (~ 在 C# 中，`Not`在 Visual Basic 中) 設為負數的結果來產生索引。

trans-unit.source: If this index is equal to the size of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array.
trans-unit.target: 這個索引等於陣列的大小，如果有任何項目大於`value`陣列中。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它是第一個元素大於索引`value`。

trans-unit.source: The comparer customizes how the elements are compared.
trans-unit.target: 比較子自訂元素的比較方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use a <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer?displayProperty=nameWithType> as the comparer to perform case-insensitive string searches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用<xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer?displayProperty=nameWithType>為要執行不區分大小寫的字串搜尋的比較子。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is not `null`, the elements of `array` are compared to the specified value using the specified <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer%601> generic interface implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`不`null`的項目`array`指定使用指定的值比較<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer%601>泛型介面實作。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by `comparer`; otherwise, the result might be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`已必須以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序`comparer`; 否則結果可能不正確。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null`, the comparison is done using the <xref:System.IComparable%601> generic interface implementation provided for type `T`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`，進行比較使用<xref:System.IComparable%601>類型提供的泛型介面實作`T`。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the <xref:System.IComparable%601> implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`已必須以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序<xref:System.IComparable%601>實作; 否則結果可能不正確。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate elements are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 允許重複的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Array> contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array>包含多個元素等於`value`，方法會傳回的其中一個相符項目，並不一定是第一個索引。

trans-unit.source: `null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception when using <xref:System.IComparable%601>.
trans-unit.target: `null` 一定要與其他任何參考類型; 比較因此，比較`null`不會產生例外狀況時使用<xref:System.IComparable%601>。

trans-unit.source: For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate <xref:System.IComparable%601> implementation, even if `value` is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目測試，`value`傳遞至適當<xref:System.IComparable%601>實作，即使`value`是`null`。

trans-unit.source: That is, the <xref:System.IComparable%601> implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，<xref:System.IComparable%601>實作可讓您決定如何為指定項目與比較`null`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

<paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, and <paramref name="value" /> is of a type that is not compatible with the elements of <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: The array whose elements need to be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 項目需要加以清除的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the range of elements to clear.
trans-unit.target: 要清除之項目範圍的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements to clear.
trans-unit.target: 要清除的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Sets a range of elements in an array to the default value of each element type.
trans-unit.target: 將陣列中的項目範圍設定為每個項目類型的預設值。

trans-unit.source: This method resets each element in an array to the element type's default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法重設項目類型的預設值為陣列中的每個項目。

trans-unit.source: It sets elements of reference types (including <xref:System.String> elements) to `null`, and sets elements of value types to the default values shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 它會設定參考類型的項目 (包括<xref:System.String>項目) 來`null`，並將實值類型的項目設定為下表中所顯示的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Type
trans-unit.target: 類型

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: All integral and floating point numeric types
trans-unit.target: 所有整數和浮點數值類型

trans-unit.source: 0 (zero)
Other value types
trans-unit.target: 其他實值類型

trans-unit.source: Default value of the type's fields
trans-unit.target: 預設值是類型的欄位

trans-unit.source: The range of cleared elements wrap from row to row in a multi-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 範圍清除項目自動換行逐列多維陣列中。

trans-unit.source: This method only clears the values of the elements; it does not delete the elements themselves.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只會清除的項目; 的值它不會刪除項目本身。

trans-unit.source: An array has a fixed size; therefore, elements cannot be added or removed.
trans-unit.target: 陣列有固定的大小。因此，無法加入或移除項目。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Array.Clear%2A> method to reset integer values in a one-dimensional, two-dimensional, and three-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Array.Clear%2A>方法來重設一維、 二維和三維陣列中的整數值。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `TimeZoneTime` structure that includes a <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> field and a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> field.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義`TimeZoneTime`結構，其中包含<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>欄位和<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>欄位。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Array.Clear%2A> method to clear one element in a two-element array of `TimeZoneTime` values.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會呼叫<xref:System.Array.Clear%2A>方法，以清除一個項目中的兩個元素陣列`TimeZoneTime`值。

trans-unit.source: The method sets the value of the cleared element to the default value of a <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> object, which is `null`, and the default value of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object, which is <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 方法會將已清除項目的值設定的預設值<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>物件，它是`null`的預設值和<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件，它是<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than the lower bound of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 <paramref name="array" /> 的下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The sum of <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the size of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="length" /> 的總和大於 <paramref name="array" /> 的大小。

trans-unit.source: Creates a shallow copy of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的淺層複本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的淺層複本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of an <xref:System.Array> copies only the elements of the <xref:System.Array>, whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to.
trans-unit.target: 淺層複本<xref:System.Array>的元素複製<xref:System.Array>，不論它們是參考類型或實值類型，但是不會複製參考所參考的物件。

trans-unit.source: The references in the new <xref:System.Array> point to the same objects that the references in the original <xref:System.Array> point to.
trans-unit.target: 在新的參考<xref:System.Array>指向相同物件中原始的參考<xref:System.Array>指向。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of an <xref:System.Array> copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，深層複製的<xref:System.Array>複製項目，並直接或間接參考之元素的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: The clone is of the same <xref:System.Type> as the original <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 複製是相同<xref:System.Type>與原始<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Array.Length%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example clones a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType> array and demonstrates the behavior of a shallow copy.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例複製品<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType>陣列，並示範的淺層複本的行為。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the data to copy.
trans-unit.target: 包含要複製資料的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <c>sourceArray</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元的整數，代表 <c>sourceArray</c> 中的索引，由此開始複製。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the data.
trans-unit.target: 接收資料的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <c>destinationArray</c> at which storing begins.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元的整數，代表 <c>destinationArray</c> 中的索引，由此開始複製。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the number of elements to copy.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元整數，表示要複製的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Copies a range of elements from an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the specified source index and pastes them to another <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the specified destination index.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 複製某範圍的項目 (從指定的來源索引開始)，並且將它們貼至另一個 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> (從指定的目的索引開始)。

trans-unit.source: Guarantees that all changes are undone if the copy does not succeed completely.
trans-unit.target: 如果此複本未完全成功，則保證所有的變更一定未完成。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: `sourceArray`和`destinationArray`參數必須有相同的維度數目。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceArray` type must be the same as or derived from the `destinationArray` type; otherwise, an <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: `sourceArray`類型必須相同，或衍生自`destinationArray`輸入; 否則<xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A>, <xref:System.Array.ConstrainedCopy%2A> verifies the compatibility of the array types before performing any operation.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Array.Copy%2A>，<xref:System.Array.ConstrainedCopy%2A>執行任何作業之前先確認陣列類型的相容性。

trans-unit.source: When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end-to-end.
trans-unit.target: 多維陣列之間進行複製，當陣列的行為如同長的一維陣列，其中資料列 （或資料行） 會在概念上排列端對端。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果陣列有三個資料列 （或資料行） 使用四個元素陣列的開頭，複製六個項目會複製全部的四個元素的第一個資料列 （或資料行） 和第二個資料列 （或資料行） 的前兩個項目。

trans-unit.source: To start copying from the second element of the third row (or column), `sourceIndex` must be the upper bound of the first row (or column) plus the length of the second row (or column) plus two.
trans-unit.target: 若要開始複製的第三個資料列 （或資料行），第二個項目從`sourceIndex`必須第一個資料列 （或資料行） 的上限加上第二個資料列 （或資料行） 的長度再加上兩個。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`重疊，這個方法的行為如同的原始值`sourceArray`已保留在暫存位置之前`destinationArray`會覆寫。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於標準的 C/c + + 函式`memmove`，而非`memcpy`。

trans-unit.source: The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays.
trans-unit.target: 陣列可以是參考類型的陣列或實值型別陣列。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type <xref:System.Object>, a shallow copy is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`有兩個參考類型的陣列或類型的兩個陣列<xref:System.Object>，會執行的淺層複本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of an <xref:System.Array> is a new <xref:System.Array> containing references to the same elements as the original <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 淺層複本<xref:System.Array>新<xref:System.Array>包含相同項目與原始參考<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied.
trans-unit.target: 項目不會複製本身或項目所參考的任何項目。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of an <xref:System.Array> copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，深層複製的<xref:System.Array>複製項目，並直接或間接參考之元素的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: If this method throws an exception while copying, the `destinationArray` remains unchanged; therefore, <xref:System.Array.ConstrainedCopy%2A> can be used within a constrained execution region (<xref:System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.Cer>).
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法會擲回的例外狀況，正在複製`destinationArray`仍維持不變; 因此，<xref:System.Array.ConstrainedCopy%2A>可用於限制的執行區域 (<xref:System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.Cer>)。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="destinationArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> and <paramref name="destinationArray" /> have different ranks.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的順位不同。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="sourceArray" /> type is neither the same as nor derived from the <paramref name="destinationArray" /> type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 類型不同於、也非衍生自 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 類型。

trans-unit.source: At least one element in <paramref name="sourceArray" /> cannot be cast to the type of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 至少有一個項目無法轉換成 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的類型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> is less than the lower bound of the first dimension of <paramref name="sourceArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> 小於 <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 的第一個維度下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="destinationIndex" /> is less than the lower bound of the first dimension of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> 小於 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的第一個維度下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements from <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> to the end of <paramref name="sourceArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大於從 <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> 到 <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 結尾的項目數。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements from <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> to the end of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大於從 <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> 到 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 結尾的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the source array.
trans-unit.target: 來源陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 目標陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to convert to a target type.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換成目標類型之以零為起始的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Converter`2" /> that converts each element from one type to another type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Converter`2" />，可將某一個類型的每一個項目轉換成另一個類型。

trans-unit.source: Converts an array of one type to an array of another type.
trans-unit.target: 將某一個類型的陣列轉換成另一個類型的陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of the target type containing the converted elements from the source array.
trans-unit.target: 目標類型的陣列，其中包含來源陣列中已轉換的項目。
