trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Converter%602> is a delegate to a method that converts an object to the target type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Converter%602>是將物件轉換成目標型別方法委派。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` are individually passed to the <xref:System.Converter%602>, and the converted elements are saved in the new array.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`分別傳遞至<xref:System.Converter%602>，和已轉換的項目會儲存在新的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The source `array` remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 來源`array`維持不變。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structure to a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會定義方法，名為`PointFToPoint`將轉換<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>結構以<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構。

trans-unit.source: The example then creates an array of <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures, creates a `Converter<PointF, Point>` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立的陣列<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>結構、 建立`Converter<PointF, Point>`委派 (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)`在 Visual Basic 中) 來代表`PointFToPoint`方法，並傳遞至委派<xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A>方法會將傳遞的輸入清單的每個項目`PointFToPoint`方法並將已轉換的項目放入新的清單<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構。

trans-unit.source: Both lists are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 這兩份清單會顯示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="converter" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="converter" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Copies a range of elements in one <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to another <see cref="T:System.Array" /> and performs type casting and boxing as required.
trans-unit.target: 將一個 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中某範圍的元素複製到另一個 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，並在必要時執行型別轉換和 Boxing。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the data to copy.
trans-unit.target: 包含要複製資料的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the data.
trans-unit.target: 接收資料的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the number of elements to copy.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元整數，表示要複製的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Copies a range of elements from an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the first element and pastes them into another <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the first element.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 複製某範圍的項目 (從第一個項目開始)，並且將它們貼至另一個 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> (從第一個項目開始)。

trans-unit.source: The length is specified as a 32-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 長度已指定為 32 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: `sourceArray`和`destinationArray`參數必須有相同的維度數目。

trans-unit.source: In addition, `destinationArray` must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements to accommodate the copied data.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`destinationArray`必須已有已建立維度，必須有足夠數目的項目，以容納所複製的資料。

trans-unit.source: When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end to end.
trans-unit.target: 多維陣列之間進行複製，當陣列的行為如同長的一維陣列，其中資料列 （或資料行） 會在概念上排列端對端。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果陣列有三個資料列 （或資料行） 使用四個元素陣列的開頭，複製六個項目會複製全部的四個元素的第一個資料列 （或資料行） 和第二個資料列 （或資料行） 的前兩個項目。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`重疊，這個方法的行為如同的原始值`sourceArray`已保留在暫存位置之前`destinationArray`會覆寫。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於標準的 C/c + + 函式`memmove`，而非`memcpy`。

trans-unit.source: The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays.
trans-unit.target: 陣列可以是參考類型的陣列或實值型別陣列。

trans-unit.source: Type downcasting is performed, as required.
trans-unit.target: 執行類型向下轉型時，視需要而定。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a reference-type array to a value-type array, each element is unboxed and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 當複製到實值類型陣列的參考型別陣列，每個項目會進行 unboxed 處理，然後再複製。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a value-type array to a reference-type array, each element is boxed and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 當實值型別陣列中複製到參考型別陣列，每個項目會進行 boxed 處理，然後再複製。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a reference-type or value-type array to an <xref:System.Object> array, an <xref:System.Object> is created to hold each value or reference and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 從參考類型或實值類型陣列到<xref:System.Object>陣列、<xref:System.Object>建立來保存每個值或參考，然後再複製。

trans-unit.source: When copying from an <xref:System.Object> array to a reference-type or value-type array and the assignment is not possible, an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 從複製時<xref:System.Object>陣列是參考類型或實值型別陣列和指派，則不可能<xref:System.InvalidCastException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type <xref:System.Object>, a shallow copy is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`有兩個參考類型的陣列或類型的兩個陣列<xref:System.Object>，會執行的淺層複本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of an <xref:System.Array> is a new <xref:System.Array> containing references to the same elements as the original <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 淺層複本<xref:System.Array>新<xref:System.Array>包含相同項目與原始參考<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied.
trans-unit.target: 項目不會複製本身或項目所參考的任何項目。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of an <xref:System.Array> copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，深層複製的<xref:System.Array>複製項目，並直接或間接參考之元素的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown if the arrays are of incompatible types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>如果陣列不相容的型別會擲回。

trans-unit.source: Type compatibility is defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 型別相容性的定義方式如下：

trans-unit.source: A type is compatible with itself.
trans-unit.target: 類型為與其本身相容。

trans-unit.source: A value type is compatible with <xref:System.Object> and with an interface type implemented by that value type.
trans-unit.target: 實值類型會與相容<xref:System.Object>和該實值型別所實作的介面型別。

trans-unit.source: A value type is considered connected to an interface only if it implements that interface directly.
trans-unit.target: 連接至介面，它會直接實作該介面時，才視為實值類型。

trans-unit.source: Disconnected types are not compatible.
trans-unit.target: 已中斷連線的類型不相容。

trans-unit.source: Two intrinsic (predefined) value types are compatible if copying from the source type to the destination type is a widening conversion.
trans-unit.target: 兩個內建函式 （預先定義） 的實值型別都相容，是否從來源類型複製到目的地類型進行擴展轉換。

trans-unit.source: A widening conversion never loses information, whereas a narrowing conversion can lose information.
trans-unit.target: 擴展轉換不會遺失資訊，而縮小轉換可能會遺失資訊。

trans-unit.source: For example, converting a 32-bit signed integer to a 64-bit signed integer is a widening conversion, and converting a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer is a narrowing conversion.
trans-unit.target: 例如，將 32 位元帶正負號的整數轉換為 64 位元帶正負號的整數擴展轉換，並將 64 位元帶正負號的整數轉換為 32 位元帶正負號的整數是縮小轉換。

trans-unit.source: For more information about conversions, see <xref:System.Convert>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Convert>。

trans-unit.source: A nonintrinsic (user-defined) value type is compatible only with itself.
trans-unit.target: 在非內建 （使用者定義） 的實值類型是只與其本身相容。

trans-unit.source: Enumerations have an implicit conversion to <xref:System.Enum> and to their underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值有隱含轉換成<xref:System.Enum>以及其基礎類型。

trans-unit.source: If every element in `sourceArray` requires a downcast (for example, from a base class to a derived class or from an interface to an object) and one or more elements cannot be cast to the corresponding type in `destinationArray`, an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在每個項目`sourceArray`需要向下轉型 （比方說，從基底類別衍生的類別或介面的物件） 以及一或多個項目無法轉換成對應的型別中`destinationArray`、<xref:System.InvalidCastException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `destinationArray` is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法會擲回的例外狀況，同時將複製的狀態`destinationArray`是未定義。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="destinationArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> and <paramref name="destinationArray" /> have different ranks.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的順位不同。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> and <paramref name="destinationArray" /> are of incompatible types.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 類型不相容。

trans-unit.source: At least one element in <paramref name="sourceArray" /> cannot be cast to the type of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 至少有一個項目無法轉換成 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的類型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements in <paramref name="sourceArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大於 <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 的項目數。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements in <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大於 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the data to copy.
trans-unit.target: 包含要複製資料的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the data.
trans-unit.target: 接收資料的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit integer that represents the number of elements to copy.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元整數，表示要複製的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The integer must be between zero and <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 這個整數必須在零和 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 之間 (包含頭尾)。

trans-unit.source: Copies a range of elements from an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the first element and pastes them into another <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the first element.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 複製某範圍的項目 (從第一個項目開始)，並且將它們貼至另一個 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> (從第一個項目開始)。

trans-unit.source: The length is specified as a 64-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 長度已指定為 64 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: `sourceArray`和`destinationArray`參數必須有相同的維度數目。

trans-unit.source: In addition, `destinationArray` must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements to accommodate the copied data.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`destinationArray`必須已有已建立維度，必須有足夠數目的項目，以容納所複製的資料。

trans-unit.source: When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end to end.
trans-unit.target: 多維陣列之間進行複製，當陣列的行為如同長的一維陣列，其中資料列 （或資料行） 會在概念上排列端對端。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果陣列有三個資料列 （或資料行） 使用四個元素陣列的開頭，複製六個項目會複製全部的四個元素的第一個資料列 （或資料行） 和第二個資料列 （或資料行） 的前兩個項目。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`重疊，這個方法的行為如同的原始值`sourceArray`已保留在暫存位置之前`destinationArray`會覆寫。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於標準的 C/c + + 函式`memmove`，而非`memcpy`。

trans-unit.source: The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays.
trans-unit.target: 陣列可以是參考類型的陣列或實值型別陣列。

trans-unit.source: Type downcasting is performed, as required.
trans-unit.target: 執行類型向下轉型時，視需要而定。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a reference-type array to a value-type array, each element is unboxed and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 當複製到實值類型陣列的參考型別陣列，每個項目會進行 unboxed 處理，然後再複製。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a value-type array to a reference-type array, each element is boxed and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 當實值型別陣列中複製到參考型別陣列，每個項目會進行 boxed 處理，然後再複製。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a reference-type or value-type array to an <xref:System.Object> array, an <xref:System.Object> is created to hold each value or reference and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 從參考類型或實值類型陣列到<xref:System.Object>陣列、<xref:System.Object>建立來保存每個值或參考，然後再複製。

trans-unit.source: When copying from an <xref:System.Object> array to a reference-type or value-type array and the assignment is not possible, an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 從複製時<xref:System.Object>陣列是參考類型或實值型別陣列和指派，則不可能<xref:System.InvalidCastException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type <xref:System.Object>, a shallow copy is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`有兩個參考類型的陣列或類型的兩個陣列<xref:System.Object>，會執行的淺層複本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of an <xref:System.Array> is a new <xref:System.Array> containing references to the same elements as the original <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 淺層複本<xref:System.Array>新<xref:System.Array>包含相同項目與原始參考<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied.
trans-unit.target: 項目不會複製本身或項目所參考的任何項目。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of an <xref:System.Array> copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，深層複製的<xref:System.Array>複製項目，並直接或間接參考之元素的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown if the arrays are of incompatible types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>如果陣列不相容的型別會擲回。

trans-unit.source: Type compatibility is defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 型別相容性的定義方式如下：

trans-unit.source: A type is compatible with itself.
trans-unit.target: 類型為與其本身相容。

trans-unit.source: A value type is compatible with <xref:System.Object> and with an interface type implemented by that value type.
trans-unit.target: 實值類型會與相容<xref:System.Object>和該實值型別所實作的介面型別。

trans-unit.source: A value type is considered connected to an interface only if it implements that interface directly.
trans-unit.target: 連接至介面，它會直接實作該介面時，才視為實值類型。

trans-unit.source: Disconnected types are not compatible.
trans-unit.target: 已中斷連線的類型不相容。

trans-unit.source: Two intrinsic (predefined) value types are compatible if copying from the source type to the destination type is a widening conversion.
trans-unit.target: 兩個內建函式 （預先定義） 的實值型別都相容，是否從來源類型複製到目的地類型進行擴展轉換。

trans-unit.source: A widening conversion never loses information, whereas a narrowing conversion can lose information.
trans-unit.target: 擴展轉換不會遺失資訊，而縮小轉換可能會遺失資訊。

trans-unit.source: For example, converting a 32-bit signed integer to a 64-bit signed integer is a widening conversion, and converting a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer is a narrowing conversion.
trans-unit.target: 例如，將 32 位元帶正負號的整數轉換為 64 位元帶正負號的整數擴展轉換，並將 64 位元帶正負號的整數轉換為 32 位元帶正負號的整數是縮小轉換。

trans-unit.source: For more information about conversions, see <xref:System.Convert>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Convert>。

trans-unit.source: A nonintrinsic (user-defined) value type is compatible only with itself.
trans-unit.target: 在非內建 （使用者定義） 的實值類型是只與其本身相容。

trans-unit.source: Enumerations have an implicit conversion to <xref:System.Enum> and to their underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值有隱含轉換成<xref:System.Enum>以及其基礎類型。

trans-unit.source: If every element in `sourceArray` requires a downcast (for example, from a base class to a derived class or from an interface to an object) and one or more elements cannot be cast to the corresponding type in `destinationArray`, an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在每個項目`sourceArray`需要向下轉型 （比方說，從基底類別衍生的類別或介面的物件） 以及一或多個項目無法轉換成對應的型別中`destinationArray`、<xref:System.InvalidCastException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `destinationArray` is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法會擲回的例外狀況，同時將複製的狀態`destinationArray`是未定義。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="destinationArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> and <paramref name="destinationArray" /> have different ranks.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的順位不同。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> and <paramref name="destinationArray" /> are of incompatible types.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 類型不相容。

trans-unit.source: At least one element in <paramref name="sourceArray" /> cannot be cast to the type of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 至少有一個項目無法轉換成 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的類型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than 0 or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小於 0 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements in <paramref name="sourceArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大於 <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 的項目數。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements in <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大於 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the data to copy.
trans-unit.target: 包含要複製資料的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <c>sourceArray</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元的整數，代表 <c>sourceArray</c> 中的索引，由此開始複製。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the data.
trans-unit.target: 接收資料的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <c>destinationArray</c> at which storing begins.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元的整數，代表 <c>destinationArray</c> 中的索引，由此開始複製。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the number of elements to copy.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元整數，表示要複製的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Copies a range of elements from an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the specified source index and pastes them to another <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the specified destination index.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 複製某範圍的項目 (從指定的來源索引開始)，並且將它們貼至另一個 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> (從指定的目的索引開始)。

trans-unit.source: The length and the indexes are specified as 32-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: 長度與索引都指定為 32 位元的整數。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: `sourceArray`和`destinationArray`參數必須有相同的維度數目。

trans-unit.source: In addition, `destinationArray` must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements starting from the `destinationIndex` position to accommodate the copied data.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`destinationArray`必須已有已建立維度，必須有足夠數目的項目從開始`destinationIndex`以容納所複製的資料的位置。

trans-unit.source: When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end-to-end.
trans-unit.target: 多維陣列之間進行複製，當陣列的行為如同長的一維陣列，其中資料列 （或資料行） 會在概念上排列端對端。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果陣列有三個資料列 （或資料行） 使用四個元素陣列的開頭，複製六個項目會複製全部的四個元素的第一個資料列 （或資料行） 和第二個資料列 （或資料行） 的前兩個項目。

trans-unit.source: To start copying from the second element of the third row (or column), `sourceIndex` must be the upper bound of the first row (or column) plus the length of the second row (or column) plus two.
trans-unit.target: 若要開始複製的第三個資料列 （或資料行），第二個項目從`sourceIndex`必須第一個資料列 （或資料行） 的上限加上第二個資料列 （或資料行） 的長度再加上兩個。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`重疊，這個方法的行為如同的原始值`sourceArray`已保留在暫存位置之前`destinationArray`會覆寫。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於標準的 C/c + + 函式`memmove`，而非`memcpy`。

trans-unit.source: The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays.
trans-unit.target: 陣列可以是參考類型的陣列或實值型別陣列。

trans-unit.source: Type downcasting is performed, as required.
trans-unit.target: 執行類型向下轉型時，視需要而定。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a reference-type array to a value-type array, each element is unboxed and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 當複製到實值類型陣列的參考型別陣列，每個項目會進行 unboxed 處理，然後再複製。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a value-type array to a reference-type array, each element is boxed and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 當實值型別陣列中複製到參考型別陣列，每個項目會進行 boxed 處理，然後再複製。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a reference-type or value-type array to an <xref:System.Object> array, an <xref:System.Object> is created to hold each value or reference and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 從參考類型或實值類型陣列到<xref:System.Object>陣列、<xref:System.Object>建立來保存每個值或參考，然後再複製。

trans-unit.source: When copying from an <xref:System.Object> array to a reference-type or value-type array and the assignment is not possible, an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 從複製時<xref:System.Object>陣列是參考類型或實值型別陣列和指派，則不可能<xref:System.InvalidCastException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type <xref:System.Object>, a shallow copy is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`有兩個參考類型的陣列或類型的兩個陣列<xref:System.Object>，會執行的淺層複本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of an <xref:System.Array> is a new <xref:System.Array> containing references to the same elements as the original <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 淺層複本<xref:System.Array>新<xref:System.Array>包含相同項目與原始參考<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied.
trans-unit.target: 項目不會複製本身或項目所參考的任何項目。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of an <xref:System.Array> copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，深層複製的<xref:System.Array>複製項目，並直接或間接參考之元素的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown if the arrays are of incompatible types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>如果陣列不相容的型別會擲回。

trans-unit.source: Type compatibility is defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 型別相容性的定義方式如下：

trans-unit.source: A type is compatible with itself.
trans-unit.target: 類型為與其本身相容。

trans-unit.source: A value type is compatible with <xref:System.Object> and with an interface type implemented by that value type.
trans-unit.target: 實值類型會與相容<xref:System.Object>和該實值型別所實作的介面型別。

trans-unit.source: A value type is considered connected to an interface only if it implements that interface directly.
trans-unit.target: 連接至介面，它會直接實作該介面時，才視為實值類型。

trans-unit.source: Disconnected types are not compatible.
trans-unit.target: 已中斷連線的類型不相容。

trans-unit.source: Two intrinsic (predefined) value types are compatible if copying from the source type to the destination type is a widening conversion.
trans-unit.target: 兩個內建函式 （預先定義） 的實值型別都相容，是否從來源類型複製到目的地類型進行擴展轉換。

trans-unit.source: A widening conversion never loses information, whereas a narrowing conversion can lose information.
trans-unit.target: 擴展轉換不會遺失資訊，而縮小轉換可能會遺失資訊。

trans-unit.source: For example, converting a 32-bit signed integer to a 64-bit signed integer is a widening conversion, and converting a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer is a narrowing conversion.
trans-unit.target: 例如，將 32 位元帶正負號的整數轉換為 64 位元帶正負號的整數擴展轉換，並將 64 位元帶正負號的整數轉換為 32 位元帶正負號的整數是縮小轉換。

trans-unit.source: For more information about conversions, see <xref:System.Convert>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Convert>。

trans-unit.source: A nonintrinsic (user-defined) value type is compatible only with itself.
trans-unit.target: 在非內建 （使用者定義） 的實值類型是只與其本身相容。

trans-unit.source: Enumerations have an implicit conversion to <xref:System.Enum> and to their underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值有隱含轉換成<xref:System.Enum>以及其基礎類型。

trans-unit.source: If every element in `sourceArray` requires a downcast (for example, from a base class to a derived class or from an interface to an object) and one or more elements cannot be cast to the corresponding type in `destinationArray`, an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在每個項目`sourceArray`需要向下轉型 （比方說，從基底類別衍生的類別或介面的物件） 以及一或多個項目無法轉換成對應的型別中`destinationArray`、<xref:System.InvalidCastException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `destinationArray` is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法會擲回的例外狀況，同時將複製的狀態`destinationArray`是未定義。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to copy from one <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Object> to another <xref:System.Array> of type integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從一個複製<xref:System.Array>型別的<xref:System.Object>到另一個<xref:System.Array>類型為整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="destinationArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> and <paramref name="destinationArray" /> have different ranks.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的順位不同。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> and <paramref name="destinationArray" /> are of incompatible types.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 類型不相容。

trans-unit.source: At least one element in <paramref name="sourceArray" /> cannot be cast to the type of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 至少有一個項目無法轉換成 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的類型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> is less than the lower bound of the first dimension of <paramref name="sourceArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> 小於 <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 的第一個維度下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="destinationIndex" /> is less than the lower bound of the first dimension of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> 小於 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的第一個維度下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements from <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> to the end of <paramref name="sourceArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大於從 <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> 到 <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 結尾的項目數。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements from <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> to the end of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大於從 <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> 到 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 結尾的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the data to copy.
trans-unit.target: 包含要複製資料的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit integer that represents the index in the <c>sourceArray</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元的整數，代表 <c>sourceArray</c> 中的索引，由此開始複製。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the data.
trans-unit.target: 接收資料的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit integer that represents the index in the <c>destinationArray</c> at which storing begins.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元的整數，代表 <c>destinationArray</c> 中的索引，由此開始複製。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit integer that represents the number of elements to copy.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元整數，表示要複製的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The integer must be between zero and <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 這個整數必須在零和 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 之間 (包含頭尾)。

trans-unit.source: Copies a range of elements from an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the specified source index and pastes them to another <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the specified destination index.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 複製某範圍的項目 (從指定的來源索引開始)，並且將它們貼至另一個 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> (從指定的目的索引開始)。

trans-unit.source: The length and the indexes are specified as 64-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: 長度與索引都指定為 64 位元的整數。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: `sourceArray`和`destinationArray`參數必須有相同的維度數目。

trans-unit.source: In addition, `destinationArray` must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements starting from the `destinationIndex` position to accommodate the copied data.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`destinationArray`必須已有已建立維度，必須有足夠數目的項目從開始`destinationIndex`以容納所複製的資料的位置。

trans-unit.source: When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end-to-end.
trans-unit.target: 多維陣列之間進行複製，當陣列的行為如同長的一維陣列，其中資料列 （或資料行） 會在概念上排列端對端。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果陣列有三個資料列 （或資料行） 使用四個元素陣列的開頭，複製六個項目會複製全部的四個元素的第一個資料列 （或資料行） 和第二個資料列 （或資料行） 的前兩個項目。

trans-unit.source: To start copying from the second element of the third row (or column), `sourceIndex` must be the upper bound of the first row (or column) plus the length of the second row (or column) plus two.
trans-unit.target: 若要開始複製的第三個資料列 （或資料行），第二個項目從`sourceIndex`必須第一個資料列 （或資料行） 的上限加上第二個資料列 （或資料行） 的長度再加上兩個。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`重疊，這個方法的行為如同的原始值`sourceArray`已保留在暫存位置之前`destinationArray`會覆寫。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於標準的 C/c + + 函式`memmove`，而非`memcpy`。

trans-unit.source: The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays.
trans-unit.target: 陣列可以是參考類型的陣列或實值型別陣列。

trans-unit.source: Type downcasting is performed, as required.
trans-unit.target: 執行類型向下轉型時，視需要而定。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a reference-type array to a value-type array, each element is unboxed and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 當複製到實值類型陣列的參考型別陣列，每個項目會進行 unboxed 處理，然後再複製。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a value-type array to a reference-type array, each element is boxed and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 當實值型別陣列中複製到參考型別陣列，每個項目會進行 boxed 處理，然後再複製。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a reference-type or value-type array to an <xref:System.Object> array, an <xref:System.Object> is created to hold each value or reference and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 從參考類型或實值類型陣列到<xref:System.Object>陣列、<xref:System.Object>建立來保存每個值或參考，然後再複製。

trans-unit.source: When copying from an <xref:System.Object> array to a reference-type or value-type array and the assignment is not possible, an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 從複製時<xref:System.Object>陣列是參考類型或實值型別陣列和指派，則不可能<xref:System.InvalidCastException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type <xref:System.Object>, a shallow copy is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`有兩個參考類型的陣列或類型的兩個陣列<xref:System.Object>，會執行的淺層複本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of an <xref:System.Array> is a new <xref:System.Array> containing references to the same elements as the original <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 淺層複本<xref:System.Array>新<xref:System.Array>包含相同項目與原始參考<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied.
trans-unit.target: 項目不會複製本身或項目所參考的任何項目。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of an <xref:System.Array> copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，深層複製的<xref:System.Array>複製項目，並直接或間接參考之元素的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown if the arrays are of incompatible types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>如果陣列不相容的型別會擲回。

trans-unit.source: Type compatibility is defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 型別相容性的定義方式如下：

trans-unit.source: A type is compatible with itself.
trans-unit.target: 類型為與其本身相容。

trans-unit.source: A value type is compatible with <xref:System.Object> and with an interface type implemented by that value type.
trans-unit.target: 實值類型會與相容<xref:System.Object>和該實值型別所實作的介面型別。

trans-unit.source: A value type is considered connected to an interface only if it implements that interface directly.
trans-unit.target: 連接至介面，它會直接實作該介面時，才視為實值類型。

trans-unit.source: Disconnected types are not compatible.
trans-unit.target: 已中斷連線的類型不相容。

trans-unit.source: Two intrinsic (predefined) value types are compatible if copying from the source type to the destination type is a widening conversion.
trans-unit.target: 兩個內建函式 （預先定義） 的實值型別都相容，是否從來源類型複製到目的地類型進行擴展轉換。

trans-unit.source: A widening conversion never loses information, whereas a narrowing conversion can lose information.
trans-unit.target: 擴展轉換不會遺失資訊，而縮小轉換可能會遺失資訊。

trans-unit.source: For example, converting a 32-bit signed integer to a 64-bit signed integer is a widening conversion, and converting a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer is a narrowing conversion.
trans-unit.target: 例如，將 32 位元帶正負號的整數轉換為 64 位元帶正負號的整數擴展轉換，並將 64 位元帶正負號的整數轉換為 32 位元帶正負號的整數是縮小轉換。

trans-unit.source: For more information about conversions, see <xref:System.Convert>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Convert>。

trans-unit.source: A nonintrinsic (user-defined) value type is compatible only with itself.
trans-unit.target: 在非內建 （使用者定義） 的實值類型是只與其本身相容。

trans-unit.source: Enumerations have an implicit conversion to <xref:System.Enum> and to their underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值有隱含轉換成<xref:System.Enum>以及其基礎類型。

trans-unit.source: If every element in `sourceArray` requires a downcast (for example, from a base class to a derived class or from an interface to an object) and one or more elements cannot be cast to the corresponding type in `destinationArray`, an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在每個項目`sourceArray`需要向下轉型 （比方說，從基底類別衍生的類別或介面的物件） 以及一或多個項目無法轉換成對應的型別中`destinationArray`、<xref:System.InvalidCastException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `destinationArray` is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法會擲回的例外狀況，同時將複製的狀態`destinationArray`是未定義。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to copy from one <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Object> to another <xref:System.Array> of type integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從一個複製<xref:System.Array>型別的<xref:System.Object>到另一個<xref:System.Array>類型為整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="destinationArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> and <paramref name="destinationArray" /> have different ranks.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的順位不同。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> and <paramref name="destinationArray" /> are of incompatible types.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 類型不相容。

trans-unit.source: At least one element in <paramref name="sourceArray" /> cannot be cast to the type of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 至少有一個項目無法轉換成 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的類型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for the <paramref name="sourceArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="destinationIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for the <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> is less than 0 or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小於 0 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements from <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> to the end of <paramref name="sourceArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大於從 <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> 到 <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 結尾的項目數。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements from <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> to the end of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大於從 <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> 到 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 結尾的項目數。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the elements of the current one-dimensional array to the specified one-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 將目前一維陣列的所有項目複製到指定的一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the current array.
trans-unit.target: 一維陣列，從目前陣列複製過來的項目之目的端。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元的整數，代表 <c>array</c> 中的索引，由此開始複製。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the elements of the current one-dimensional array to the specified one-dimensional array starting at the specified destination array index.
trans-unit.target: 將目前一維陣列的所有項目複製到指定的一維陣列 (從指定的目的陣列索引開始)。

trans-unit.source: The index is specified as a 32-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 索引已指定為 32 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: This method copies all the elements of the current array instance to the `array` destination array, starting at index `index`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會複製到目前的陣列執行個體的所有項目`array`索引處開始的目的陣列`index`。

trans-unit.source: The `array` destination array must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements to accommodate the copied elements.
trans-unit.target: `array`目的陣列必須已經有尚未建立維度，而且必須具有足夠容納複製之元素的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 否則，方法會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This method supports the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法支援<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面。

trans-unit.source: If implementing <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> is not explicitly required, use <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A> to avoid an extra indirection.
trans-unit.target: 如果實作<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>是不明確的需求，使用<xref:System.Array.Copy%2A>以避免額外的間接取值。

trans-unit.source: If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `array` is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法會擲回的例外狀況，同時將複製的狀態`array`是未定義。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Array.Length%2A>.It performs a shallow copy only.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>。它會執行淺層複本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to copy an <xref:System.Array> to another <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將複製<xref:System.Array>到另一個<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to copy an <xref:System.Array> to another <xref:System.Array> with a nonzero lower bound.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將複製<xref:System.Array>到另一個<xref:System.Array>，則為非零的下限。

trans-unit.source: Note that the entire source <xref:System.Array> is copied, including empty elements that overwrite existing elements in the target <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，整個來源<xref:System.Array>複製時，包括覆寫現有的項目在目標中的空項目<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than the lower bound of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 <paramref name="array" /> 的下限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The number of elements in the source array is greater than the available number of elements from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 來源陣列中的項目數大於從 <paramref name="index" /> 到目的 <paramref name="array" /> 結尾的可用項目數。

trans-unit.source: The type of the source <see cref="T:System.Array" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 來源 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的類型無法自動轉換成目的 <paramref name="array" /> 的類型。

trans-unit.source: The source array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: 該來源陣列為多維。

trans-unit.source: At least one element in the source <see cref="T:System.Array" /> cannot be cast to the type of destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 來源 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中至少有一個項目無法轉換成目的 <paramref name="array" /> 的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the current array.
trans-unit.target: 一維陣列，從目前陣列複製過來的項目之目的端。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit integer that represents the index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元的整數，代表 <c>array</c> 中的索引，由此開始複製。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the elements of the current one-dimensional array to the specified one-dimensional array starting at the specified destination array index.
trans-unit.target: 將目前一維陣列的所有項目複製到指定的一維陣列 (從指定的目的陣列索引開始)。

trans-unit.source: The index is specified as a 64-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 索引已指定為 64 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: This method copies all the elements of the current array instance to the `array` destination array, starting at index `index`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會複製到目前的陣列執行個體的所有項目`array`索引處開始的目的陣列`index`。

trans-unit.source: The `array` destination array must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements to accommodate the copied elements.
trans-unit.target: `array`目的陣列必須已經有尚未建立維度，而且必須具有足夠容納複製之元素的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 否則，方法會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This method supports the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法支援<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面。

trans-unit.source: If implementing <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> is not explicitly required, use <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A> to avoid an extra indirection.
trans-unit.target: 如果實作<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>是不明確的需求，使用<xref:System.Array.Copy%2A>以避免額外的間接取值。

trans-unit.source: If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `array` is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法會擲回的例外狀況，同時將複製的狀態`array`是未定義。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Array.Length%2A>.It performs a shallow copy only.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>。它會執行淺層複本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to copy an <xref:System.Array> to another <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將複製<xref:System.Array>到另一個<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to copy an <xref:System.Array> to another <xref:System.Array> with a nonzero lower bound.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將複製<xref:System.Array>到另一個<xref:System.Array>，則為非零的下限。

trans-unit.source: Note that the entire source <xref:System.Array> is copied, including empty elements that overwrite existing elements in the target <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，整個來源<xref:System.Array>複製時，包括覆寫現有的項目在目標中的空項目<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 超出 <paramref name="array" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The number of elements in the source array is greater than the available number of elements from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 來源陣列中的項目數大於從 <paramref name="index" /> 到目的 <paramref name="array" /> 結尾的可用項目數。

trans-unit.source: The type of the source <see cref="T:System.Array" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 來源 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的類型無法自動轉換成目的 <paramref name="array" /> 的類型。

trans-unit.source: The source <see cref="T:System.Array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: 來源 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: At least one element in the source <see cref="T:System.Array" /> cannot be cast to the type of destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 來源 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中至少有一個項目無法轉換成目的 <paramref name="array" /> 的類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立之 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The size of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的大小。

trans-unit.source: Creates a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> and length, with zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 和長度的一維 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> (具有以零起始的索引)。

trans-unit.source: A new one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> with the specified length, using zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 新的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，具有指定的長度和指定的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，並使用以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Unlike most classes, <xref:System.Array> provides the <xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A> method, instead of public constructors, to allow for late bound access.
trans-unit.target: 不同於大部分的類別，<xref:System.Array>提供<xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A>方法，而不是公用建構函式，以允許晚期繫結的存取。

trans-unit.source: Reference-type elements are initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 參考類型的項目會初始化為`null`。

trans-unit.source: Value-type elements are initialized to zero.
trans-unit.target: 實值型別元素會初始化為零。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create and initialize a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化一維<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援 <paramref name="elementType" />。

trans-unit.source: For example, <see cref="T:System.Void" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see cref="T:System.Void" /> 不受支援。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="elementType" /> is an open generic type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 是開放式泛型類型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立之 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of 32-bit integers that represent the size of each dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元整數的陣列，代表 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 所建立之每個維度的大小。

trans-unit.source: Creates a multidimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> and dimension lengths, with zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 和維度長度的多維 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> (具有以零起始的索引)。

trans-unit.source: The dimension lengths are specified in an array of 32-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: 維度長度已指定在 32 位元整數的陣列中。

trans-unit.source: A new multidimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> with the specified length for each dimension, using zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 新的多維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，具有指定的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 且每個維度具有指定的長度，並使用以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Unlike most classes, <xref:System.Array> provides the <xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A> method, instead of public constructors, to allow for late bound access.
trans-unit.target: 不同於大部分的類別，<xref:System.Array>提供<xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A>方法，而不是公用建構函式，以允許晚期繫結的存取。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the `lengths` array must equal the number of dimensions in the new <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目數`lengths`陣列必須等於在新的維度數目<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: Each element of the `lengths` array must specify the length of the corresponding dimension in the new <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目`lengths`陣列必須指定之相對應維度的長度，在新<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: Reference-type elements are initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 參考類型的項目會初始化為`null`。

trans-unit.source: Value-type elements are initialized to zero.
trans-unit.target: 實值型別元素會初始化為零。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the product of all values in `lengths`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是中的所有值的乘積`lengths`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create and initialize a multidimensional <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化多維度<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="lengths" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="lengths" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="lengths" /> array contains less than one element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="lengths" /> 陣列包含少於一個項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援 <paramref name="elementType" />。

trans-unit.source: For example, <see cref="T:System.Void" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see cref="T:System.Void" /> 不受支援。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="elementType" /> is an open generic type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 是開放式泛型型別。

trans-unit.source: Any value in <paramref name="lengths" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="lengths" /> 中的任何值小於零。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立之 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of 64-bit integers that represent the size of each dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元整數的陣列，代表要建立的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的每個維度大小。

trans-unit.source: Each integer in the array must be between zero and <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的每一個整數必須在零和 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 之間 (包含頭尾)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a multidimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> and dimension lengths, with zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 和維度長度的多維 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> (具有以零起始的索引)。

trans-unit.source: The dimension lengths are specified in an array of 64-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: 維度長度已指定在 64 位元整數的陣列中。

trans-unit.source: A new multidimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> with the specified length for each dimension, using zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 新的多維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，具有指定的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 且每個維度具有指定的長度，並使用以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Unlike most classes, <xref:System.Array> provides the <xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A> method, instead of public constructors, to allow for late bound access.
trans-unit.target: 不同於大部分的類別，<xref:System.Array>提供<xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A>方法，而不是公用建構函式，以允許晚期繫結的存取。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the `lengths` array must equal the number of dimensions in the new <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目數`lengths`陣列必須等於在新的維度數目<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: Each element of the `lengths` array must specify the length of the corresponding dimension in the new <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目`lengths`陣列必須指定之相對應維度的長度，在新<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: Reference-type elements are initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 參考類型的項目會初始化為`null`。

trans-unit.source: Value-type elements are initialized to zero.
trans-unit.target: 實值型別元素會初始化為零。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the product of all values in `lengths`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是中的所有值的乘積`lengths`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create and initialize a multidimensional <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化多維度<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="lengths" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="lengths" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="lengths" /> array contains less than one element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="lengths" /> 陣列包含少於一個項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援 <paramref name="elementType" />。

trans-unit.source: For example, <see cref="T:System.Void" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see cref="T:System.Void" /> 不受支援。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="elementType" /> is an open generic type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 是開放式泛型類型。

trans-unit.source: Any value in <paramref name="lengths" /> is less than zero or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="lengths" /> 中的任何值小於零或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立之 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The size of the first dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立之 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的第一個維度大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the second dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立之 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的第二個維度大小。

trans-unit.source: Creates a two-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> and dimension lengths, with zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 和維度長度的二維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> (具有以零為起始的索引)。

trans-unit.source: A new two-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> with the specified length for each dimension, using zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 新的二維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，具有指定的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 且每個維度具有指定的長度，並使用以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Unlike most classes, <xref:System.Array> provides the <xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A> method, instead of public constructors, to allow for late bound access.
trans-unit.target: 不同於大部分的類別，<xref:System.Array>提供<xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A>方法，而不是公用建構函式，以允許晚期繫結的存取。

trans-unit.source: Reference-type elements are initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 參考類型的項目會初始化為`null`。

trans-unit.source: Value-type elements are initialized to zero.
trans-unit.target: 實值型別元素會初始化為零。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the product of `length1` and `length2`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`的產品`length1`和`length2`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create and initialize a two-dimensional <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化二維<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援 <paramref name="elementType" />。

trans-unit.source: For example, <see cref="T:System.Void" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see cref="T:System.Void" /> 不受支援。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="elementType" /> is an open generic type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 是開放式泛型類型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length1" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length1" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length2" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length2" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立之 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array that contains the size of each dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 一維陣列，包含要建立的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的每個維度大小。

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array that contains the lower bound (starting index) of each dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 一維陣列，包含要建立的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的每個維度下限 (起始索引)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a multidimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> and dimension lengths, with the specified lower bounds.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 和維度長度的多維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> (具有指定的下限)。

trans-unit.source: A new multidimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> with the specified length and lower bound for each dimension.
trans-unit.target: 新的多維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，具有指定的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 且每個維度具有指定的長度和下限。

trans-unit.source: Unlike most classes, <xref:System.Array> provides the <xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A> method, instead of public constructors, to allow for late bound access.
trans-unit.target: 不同於大部分的類別，<xref:System.Array>提供<xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A>方法，而不是公用建構函式，以允許晚期繫結的存取。

trans-unit.source: The `lengths` and `lowerBounds` arrays must have the same number of elements.
trans-unit.target: `lengths`和`lowerBounds`陣列必須有相同數目的項目。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the `lengths` array must equal the number of dimensions in the new <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目數`lengths`陣列必須等於在新的維度數目<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: Each element of the `lengths` array must specify the length of the corresponding dimension in the new <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目`lengths`陣列必須指定之相對應維度的長度，在新<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: Each element of the `lowerBounds` array must specify the lower bound of the corresponding dimension in the new <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目`lowerBounds`陣列必須在新指定的相對應維度的下限<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: Generally, the .NET Framework class library and many programming languages do not handle nonzero lower bounds.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，.NET Framework 類別庫和許多程式語言不處理非零的下限。

trans-unit.source: Reference-type elements are initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 參考類型的項目會初始化為`null`。

trans-unit.source: Value-type elements are initialized to zero.
trans-unit.target: 實值型別元素會初始化為零。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the product of all values in `lengths`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是中的所有值的乘積`lengths`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create and initialize a multidimensional <xref:System.Array> with specified lower bounds.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化多維度<xref:System.Array>與指定的下限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="lengths" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="lengths" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="lowerBounds" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="lowerBounds" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="lengths" /> array contains less than one element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="lengths" /> 陣列包含少於一個項目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="lengths" /> and <paramref name="lowerBounds" /> arrays do not contain the same number of elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="lengths" /> 和 <paramref name="lowerBounds" /> 陣列未包含相同數目的項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援 <paramref name="elementType" />。

trans-unit.source: For example, <see cref="T:System.Void" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see cref="T:System.Void" /> 不受支援。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="elementType" /> is an open generic type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 是開放式泛型型別。

trans-unit.source: Any value in <paramref name="lengths" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="lengths" /> 中的任何值小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Any value in <paramref name="lowerBounds" /> is very large, such that the sum of a dimension's lower bound and length is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="lowerBounds" /> 中的任何值非常大，使用維度的下限和長度總和大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立之 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The size of the first dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立之 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的第一個維度大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the second dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的第二個維度大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the third dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的第三個維度大小。

trans-unit.source: Creates a three-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> and dimension lengths, with zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 和維度長度的三維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> (具有以零為起始的索引)。

trans-unit.source: A new three-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> with the specified length for each dimension, using zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 指定之 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的新三維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，且每個維度具有指定的長度，並使用以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Unlike most classes, <xref:System.Array> provides the <xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A> method, instead of public constructors, to allow for late bound access.
trans-unit.target: 不同於大部分的類別，<xref:System.Array>提供<xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A>方法，而不是公用建構函式，以允許晚期繫結的存取。

trans-unit.source: Reference-type elements are initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 參考類型的項目會初始化為`null`。

trans-unit.source: Value-type elements are initialized to zero.
trans-unit.target: 實值型別元素會初始化為零。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the product of `length1`, `length2`, and `length3`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`的產品`length1`， `length2`，和`length3`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create and initialize a three-dimensional <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化 3d <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elementType" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援 <paramref name="elementType" />。

trans-unit.source: For example, <see cref="T:System.Void" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see cref="T:System.Void" /> 不受支援。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="elementType" /> is an open generic type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 是開放式泛型類型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length1" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length1" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length2" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length2" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length3" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length3" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回空陣列。

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回空的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的以零為起始的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" /> that defines the conditions of the elements to search for.
trans-unit.target: 定義搜尋項目之條件的 <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified array contains elements that match the conditions defined by the specified predicate.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的陣列是否包含符合指定之述詞 (Predicate) 所定義的條件之項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="array" /> contains one or more elements that match the conditions defined by the specified predicate; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="array" /> 包含的一或多個項目符合指定述詞所定義的條件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Predicate%601> is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Predicate%601>委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` are individually passed to the <xref:System.Predicate%601>, and processing is stopped when a match is found.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`分別傳遞至<xref:System.Predicate%601>，並在找到相符項目時，會停止處理。

trans-unit.source: In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the <xref:System.Predicate%601> delegate explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，就不需要建立<xref:System.Predicate%601>明確委派。

trans-unit.source: These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically.
trans-unit.target: 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following example specifies the match conditions for the <xref:System.Array.Exists%2A> method usinglambda expressions to check whether a planet starts with a given letter or whether the planet is found on the given array.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會指定比對條件<xref:System.Array.Exists%2A>方法 usinglambda 運算式，以檢查是否憑藉開頭為指定的字母或世界各地是否位於指定的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Array.Exists%2A> method to indicate whether any names in a string array begin with a specified character.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Array.Exists%2A>方法，指出是否將字串陣列中的任何名稱開頭為指定的字元。

trans-unit.source: The example instantiates a `StringSearcher` object by passing the string to search for to its class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會具現化`StringSearcher`物件，並傳遞要搜尋其類別建構函式的字串。

trans-unit.source: The `StringSearcher.StartsWith` method has same signature as the <xref:System.Predicate%601> delegate.
trans-unit.target: `StringSearcher.StartsWith`方法具有相同的簽章<xref:System.Predicate%601>委派。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Array.Exists%2A> method is called, each member of the array is passed to the delegate until it returns `true` or iterates all the elements in the array.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Array.Exists%2A>方法呼叫，直到傳回陣列的每個成員會傳遞給委派`true`或會逐一查看陣列中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: You can also use a lambda expression rather than explicitly define a method whose signature corresponds to that of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 您可以也使用 lambda 運算式而非明確定義其簽章對應的方法委派。

trans-unit.source: The following example replaces the `StringSearcher` class and its `StartsWith` method with a lambda expression.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會取代`StringSearcher`類別和其`StartsWith`方法與 lambda 運算式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="match" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="match" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based array to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維、以零為起始的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The predicate that defines the conditions of the element to search for.
trans-unit.target: 定義要搜尋項目之條件的述詞。

trans-unit.source: Searches for an element that matches the conditions defined by the specified predicate, and returns the first occurrence within the entire <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋符合指定之述詞所定義的條件之項目，並傳回整個 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 內第一個相符的項目。

trans-unit.source: The first element that matches the conditions defined by the specified predicate, if found; otherwise, the default value for type <paramref name="T" />.
trans-unit.target: 第一個符合指定之述詞所定義的條件之項目 (如有找到)，否則為類型 <paramref name="T" /> 的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Predicate%601> is a delegate to a method or a lambda expression that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate or lambda expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Predicate%601>是一種委派的方法或 lambda 運算式以傳回`true`傳送至的物件是否符合委派或 lambda 運算式中定義的條件。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` are individually passed to the <xref:System.Predicate%601>, starting with the first element and ending with the last element.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`分別傳遞至<xref:System.Predicate%601>、 第一個元素開始和結尾最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Processing is stopped when a match is found.
trans-unit.target: 找到相符項目時，會停止處理。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Predicate%601> delegate with the <xref:System.Array.Find%2A> generic method to search an array of <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Predicate%601>委派與<xref:System.Array.Find%2A>泛型的方法來搜尋的陣列<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構。

trans-unit.source: The method the delegate represents, `ProductGT10`, returns `true` if the product of the X and Y fields is greater than 100,000.
trans-unit.target: 委派所表示的方法`ProductGT10`，傳回`true`產品 X 和 Y 欄位是否大於 100000。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Find%2A> method calls the delegate for each element of the array, returning the first point that meets the test condition.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Find%2A>方法會呼叫委派的陣列，傳回符合測試條件的第一個點的每個項目。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic and C# users do not have to create the delegate explicitly or specify the type argument of the generic method.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 和 C# 使用者不必明確地建立委派，或指定之泛型方法的型別引數。

trans-unit.source: The compilers determine the necessary types from the method arguments you supply.
trans-unit.target: 在編譯器判斷您提供的方法引數的必要型別。

trans-unit.source: Rather than explicitly defining a method with the necessary signature, instantiating a <xref:System.Predicate%601> delegate, and passing the delegate to the <xref:System.Array.Find%2A> method, it is customary to use a lambda expression.
trans-unit.target: 而不是具有所需的簽章的方法中明確定義具現化<xref:System.Predicate%601>委派，並傳遞至委派<xref:System.Array.Find%2A>方法，您就可使用 lambda 運算式。

trans-unit.source: The following example is identical to the previous one, except that it uses a lambda expression as the `match` argument.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例等同於前一個，不同之處在於它會使用 lambda 運算式，當做`match`引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="match" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="match" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的以零為起始的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" /> that defines the conditions of the elements to search for.
trans-unit.target: 定義搜尋項目之條件的 <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all the elements that match the conditions defined by the specified predicate.
trans-unit.target: 擷取符合指定之述詞所定義的條件之所有項目。
