trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> containing all the elements that match the conditions defined by the specified predicate, if found; otherwise, an empty <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" />，其中包含符合指定之述詞所定義的條件之所有元素 (如果有找到的話)，否則為空的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Predicate%601> is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Predicate%601>委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` are individually passed to the <xref:System.Predicate%601>, and the elements that match the conditions are saved in the returned array.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`分別傳遞至<xref:System.Predicate%601>，和符合之條件的項目會儲存在傳回的陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an array of 50 random numbers with values that can range from 0 to 1,000.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立 50 的隨機數字的陣列，範圍從 0 到 1000 的值。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Array.FindAll%2A> method with a lambda expression that returns the values that range from 300 to 600.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會呼叫<xref:System.Array.FindAll%2A>方法與 lambda 運算式的傳回值範圍從 300 為 600。

trans-unit.source: Note that the lambda expression is passed a parameter named `x`; this represents the individual array member that is passed to the <xref:System.Predicate%601>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，lambda 運算式傳遞參數，名為`x`; 這代表傳遞至個別的陣列成員<xref:System.Predicate%601>。

trans-unit.source: Also note that the local `lBound` and `uBound` variables are accessible within the lambda expression.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，本機`lBound`和`uBound`變數是 lambda 運算式內存取。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Array.Find%2A>, <xref:System.Array.FindLast%2A>, and <xref:System.Array.FindAll%2A> generic methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Array.Find%2A>， <xref:System.Array.FindLast%2A>，和<xref:System.Array.FindAll%2A>泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 會建立字串陣列，包含 8 恐龍名稱，兩個 （在位置 1 和 5） 」 saurus 」 以結束。

trans-unit.source: The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例也會定義名為的搜尋述詞方法`EndsWithSaurus`、 可接受字串參數和傳回布林值，指出是否"saurus"輸入的字串結尾。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Find%2A> generic method traverses the array from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Find%2A>泛型方法會從開始，接著為傳遞每個項目來周遊陣列`EndsWithSaurus`方法。

trans-unit.source: The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element "Amargasaurus".
trans-unit.target: 搜尋會停止時`EndsWithSaurus`方法會傳回`true`"Amargasaurus"的項目。

trans-unit.source: In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate<string>` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，就不需要建立`Predicate<string>`委派 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 明確。

trans-unit.source: These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically.
trans-unit.target: 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.FindLast%2A> generic method is used to search the array backward from the end.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.FindLast%2A>泛型的方法用來搜尋從結尾回溯陣列。

trans-unit.source: It finds the element "Dilophosaurus" at position 5.
trans-unit.target: 它會找到項目 」 Dilophosaurus 」 在位置 5。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.FindAll%2A> generic method is used to return an array containing all the elements that end in "saurus".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.FindAll%2A>泛型的方法用來傳回陣列，其中包含 「 saurus"結尾的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: The elements are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 所顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: The code example also demonstrates the <xref:System.Array.Exists%2A> and <xref:System.Array.TrueForAll%2A> generic methods.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例也示範<xref:System.Array.Exists%2A>和<xref:System.Array.TrueForAll%2A>泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="match" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="match" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for an element that matches the conditions defined by a specified predicate, and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> or a portion of it.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋符合指定之述詞所定義的條件之元素，並傳回 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 內或它的一部分中第一個相符項目之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維且以零為起始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" /> that defines the conditions of the element to search for.
trans-unit.target: 定義要搜尋項目之條件的 <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for an element that matches the conditions defined by the specified predicate, and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋符合指定之述詞所定義的條件之項目，並傳回整個 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 內第一次出現之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of an element that matches the conditions defined by <paramref name="match" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 第一次出現符合 <paramref name="match" /> 所定義之條件的項目以零為起始的索引 (如有找到)；否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> is searched forward starting at the first element and ending at the last element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>搜尋向前第一個項目開始和結束時間的最後一個元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Predicate%601> is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Predicate%601>委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` are individually passed to the <xref:System.Predicate%601>.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`分別傳遞至<xref:System.Predicate%601>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates all three overloads of the <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%2A> generic method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範的所有三個多載<xref:System.Array.FindIndex%2A>泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 會建立字串陣列，包含 8 恐龍名稱，兩個 （在位置 1 和 5） 」 saurus 」 以結束。

trans-unit.source: The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例也會定義名為的搜尋述詞方法`EndsWithSaurus`、 可接受字串參數和傳回布林值，指出是否"saurus"輸入的字串結尾。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29> method overload traverses the array from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法多載會從開始，接著為傳遞每個項目來周遊陣列`EndsWithSaurus`方法。

trans-unit.source: The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element at position 1.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋會停止時`EndsWithSaurus`方法會傳回`true`位置 1 處的項目。

trans-unit.source: In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate<string>` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，就不需要建立`Predicate<string>`委派 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 明確。

trans-unit.source: These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically.
trans-unit.target: 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29> method overload is used to search the array beginning at position 2 and continuing to the end of the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法多載用來搜尋位置 2 開始，延續至陣列結尾的陣列。

trans-unit.source: It finds the element at position 5.
trans-unit.target: 它會找到 5 處的項目。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29> method overload is used to search the range of three elements beginning at position 2.
trans-unit.target: 最後，<xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法多載用來搜尋的位置 2 開始的三個項目範圍。

trans-unit.source: It returns –1 because there are no dinosaur names in that range that end with "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 因為沒有在該範圍內恐龍名稱結尾是"saurus"，它會傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="match" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="match" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維且以零為起始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the search.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋之以零為起始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" /> that defines the conditions of the element to search for.
trans-unit.target: 定義要搜尋項目之條件的 <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for an element that matches the conditions defined by the specified predicate, and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the range of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that extends from the specified index to the last element.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋符合指定之述詞所定義的條件之項目，並傳回 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 內 (從指定之索引延伸到最後一個項目)，於某項目範圍中第一次出現之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of an element that matches the conditions defined by <paramref name="match" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 第一次出現符合 <paramref name="match" /> 所定義之條件的項目以零為起始的索引 (如有找到)；否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the last element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>開始向前搜尋`startIndex`和結束時間的最後一個元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Predicate%601> is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Predicate%601>委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` are individually passed to the <xref:System.Predicate%601>.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`分別傳遞至<xref:System.Predicate%601>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements from `startIndex` to the end of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是從元素數目`startIndex`結尾`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates all three overloads of the <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%2A> generic method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範的所有三個多載<xref:System.Array.FindIndex%2A>泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 會建立字串陣列，包含 8 恐龍名稱，兩個 （在位置 1 和 5） 」 saurus 」 以結束。

trans-unit.source: The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例也會定義名為的搜尋述詞方法`EndsWithSaurus`、 可接受字串參數和傳回布林值，指出是否"saurus"輸入的字串結尾。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29> method overload traverses the array from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法多載會從開始，接著為傳遞每個項目來周遊陣列`EndsWithSaurus`方法。

trans-unit.source: The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element at position 1.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋會停止時`EndsWithSaurus`方法會傳回`true`位置 1 處的項目。

trans-unit.source: In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate<string>` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，就不需要建立`Predicate<string>`委派 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 明確。

trans-unit.source: These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically.
trans-unit.target: 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29> method overload is used to search the array beginning at position 2 and continuing to the end of the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法多載用來搜尋位置 2 開始，延續至陣列結尾的陣列。

trans-unit.source: It finds the element at position 5.
trans-unit.target: 它會找到 5 處的項目。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29> method overload is used to search the range of three elements beginning at position 2.
trans-unit.target: 最後，<xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法多載用來搜尋的位置 2 開始的三個項目範圍。

trans-unit.source: It returns –1 because there are no dinosaur names in that range that end with "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 因為沒有在該範圍內恐龍名稱結尾是"saurus"，它會傳回-1。

<paramref name="match" /> is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維且以零為起始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the search.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋之以零為起始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the section to search.
trans-unit.target: 區段中要搜尋的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" /> that defines the conditions of the element to search for.
trans-unit.target: 定義要搜尋項目之條件的 <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for an element that matches the conditions defined by the specified predicate, and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the range of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that starts at the specified index and contains the specified number of elements.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋符合指定之述詞所定義的條件之項目，並傳回 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中從指定之索引開始，且包含指定之項目數目的項目範圍內第一個符合項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of an element that matches the conditions defined by <paramref name="match" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 第一次出現符合 <paramref name="match" /> 所定義之條件的項目以零為起始的索引 (如有找到)；否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` plus `count` minus 1, if `count` is greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>開始向前搜尋`startIndex`結束為`startIndex`加上`count`減 1，如果`count`大於 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Predicate%601> is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Predicate%601>委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` are individually passed to the <xref:System.Predicate%601>.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`分別傳遞至<xref:System.Predicate%601>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `count`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`count`。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維且以零為起始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" /> that defines the conditions of the element to search for.

trans-unit.source: Searches for an element that matches the conditions defined by the specified predicate, and returns the last occurrence within the entire <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋符合指定之述詞所定義的條件之項目，並傳回整個 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 內最後一個相符的項目。

trans-unit.source: The last element that matches the conditions defined by the specified predicate, if found; otherwise, the default value for type <paramref name="T" />.
trans-unit.target: 最後一個符合指定之述詞所定義的條件之項目 (如有找到)，否則為類型 <paramref name="T" /> 的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Predicate%601> is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Predicate%601>委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` are individually passed to the <xref:System.Predicate%601>, moving backward in the <xref:System.Array>, starting with the last element and ending with the first element.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`分別傳遞至<xref:System.Predicate%601>、 移動中回溯<xref:System.Array>、 最後一個元素開始和結束的第一個元素。

trans-unit.source: Processing is stopped when a match is found.
trans-unit.target: 找到相符項目時，會停止處理。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 會建立字串陣列，包含 8 恐龍名稱，兩個 （在位置 1 和 5） 」 saurus 」 以結束。

trans-unit.source: The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例也會定義名為的搜尋述詞方法`EndsWithSaurus`、 可接受字串參數和傳回布林值，指出是否"saurus"輸入的字串結尾。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Find%2A> generic method traverses the array from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Find%2A>泛型方法會從開始，接著為傳遞每個項目來周遊陣列`EndsWithSaurus`方法。

trans-unit.source: The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element "Amargasaurus".

trans-unit.source: In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the`Predicate<string>` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.FindLast%2A> generic method is used to search the array backward from the end.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.FindLast%2A>泛型的方法用來搜尋從結尾回溯陣列。

trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維且以零為起始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" /> that defines the conditions of the element to search for.
trans-unit.target: 定義要搜尋項目之條件的 <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for an element that matches the conditions defined by the specified predicate, and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the entire <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋符合指定之述詞所定義的條件之項目，並傳回整個 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 內最後一次出現之以為零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of an element that matches the conditions defined by <paramref name="match" />, if found; otherwise, –1.
trans-unit.target: 符合 <paramref name="match" /> 所定義之條件且最後一次出現之項目的以零為起始的索引 (如有找到)，如未找到則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> is searched backward starting at the last element and ending at the first element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>向後的最後一個項目開始和結束時間的第一個項目中搜尋。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Predicate%601> is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Predicate%601>委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` are individually passed to the <xref:System.Predicate%601>.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`分別傳遞至<xref:System.Predicate%601>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates all three overloads of the <xref:System.Array.FindLastIndex%2A> generic method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範的所有三個多載<xref:System.Array.FindLastIndex%2A>泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 會建立字串陣列，包含 8 恐龍名稱，兩個 （在位置 1 和 5） 」 saurus 」 以結束。

trans-unit.source: The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例也會定義名為的搜尋述詞方法`EndsWithSaurus`、 可接受字串參數和傳回布林值，指出是否"saurus"輸入的字串結尾。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.FindLastIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29> method overload traverses the array backward from the end, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.FindLastIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法多載周遊回溯陣列結束時，依序為傳遞每個項目從`EndsWithSaurus`方法。

trans-unit.source: The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element at position 5.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋會停止時`EndsWithSaurus`方法會傳回`true`位置 5 處的項目。

trans-unit.source: In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate<string>` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，就不需要建立`Predicate<string>`委派 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 明確。

trans-unit.source: These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically.
trans-unit.target: 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.FindLastIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29> method overload is used to search the array beginning at position 4 and continuing backward to the beginning of the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.FindLastIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法多載用來搜尋位置 4 開始，並繼續向後陣列開頭的陣列。

trans-unit.source: It finds the element at position 1.
trans-unit.target: 它會尋找在位置 1 的項目。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Array.FindLastIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29> method overload is used to search the range of three elements beginning at position 4 and working backward (that is, elements 4, 3, and 2).
trans-unit.target: 最後，<xref:System.Array.FindLastIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法多載用來搜尋的三個項目範圍從 4 位置開始並回溯 （也就是項目 4、 3 和 2）。

trans-unit.source: It returns –1 because there are no dinosaur names in that range that end with "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 因為沒有在該範圍內恐龍名稱結尾是"saurus"，它會傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="match" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="match" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的以零為起始的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the backward search.
trans-unit.target: 向後搜尋之以零為起始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" /> that defines the conditions of the element to search for.
trans-unit.target: 定義要搜尋項目之條件的 <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for an element that matches the conditions defined by the specified predicate, and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the range of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that extends from the first element to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋符合指定之述詞所定義的條件之項目，並傳回 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中從第一個項目延伸到指定之索引的項目範圍內，最後一個符合項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of an element that matches the conditions defined by <paramref name="match" />, if found; otherwise, –1.
trans-unit.target: 符合 <paramref name="match" /> 所定義之條件且最後一次出現之項目的以零為起始的索引 (如有找到)，如未找到則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the first element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>是搜尋回溯開始`startIndex`和結束時間的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Predicate%601> is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Predicate%601>委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` are individually passed to the <xref:System.Predicate%601>.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`分別傳遞至<xref:System.Predicate%601>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements from the beginning of `array` to `startIndex`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是從開頭的項目數`array`至`startIndex`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates all three overloads of the <xref:System.Array.FindLastIndex%2A> generic method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範的所有三個多載<xref:System.Array.FindLastIndex%2A>泛型方法。

trans-unit.target: 搜尋會停止時`EndsWithSaurus`方法會傳回`true`位置 5 處的項目。

trans-unit.target: 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，就不需要建立`Predicate<string>`委派 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 明確。

trans-unit.source: These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically.
trans-unit.target: 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.FindLastIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29> method overload is used to search the array beginning at position 4 and continuing backward to the beginning of the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.FindLastIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法多載用來搜尋位置 4 開始，並繼續向後陣列開頭的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Array.FindLastIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29> method overload is used to search the range of three elements beginning at position 4 and working backward (that is, elements 4, 3, and 2).
trans-unit.target: 最後，<xref:System.Array.FindLastIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法多載用來搜尋的三個項目範圍從 4 位置開始並回溯 （也就是項目 4、 3 和 2）。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的以零為起始的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the backward search.
trans-unit.target: 向後搜尋之以零為起始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the section to search.
trans-unit.target: 區段中要搜尋的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" /> that defines the conditions of the element to search for.
trans-unit.target: 定義要搜尋項目之條件的 <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for an element that matches the conditions defined by the specified predicate, and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the range of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the specified number of elements and ends at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋符合指定之述詞所定義的條件之項目，並傳回 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中包含指定之項目數目，且結束於指定之索引的項目範圍內最後一個符合項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of an element that matches the conditions defined by <paramref name="match" />, if found; otherwise, –1.
trans-unit.target: 符合 <paramref name="match" /> 所定義之條件且最後一次出現之項目的以零為起始的索引 (如有找到)，如未找到則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` minus `count` plus 1, if `count` is greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>是搜尋回溯開始`startIndex`結束為`startIndex`減去`count`再加上 1，如果`count`大於 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Predicate%601> is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Predicate%601>委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` are individually passed to the <xref:System.Predicate%601>.
trans-unit.target: 項目`array`分別傳遞至<xref:System.Predicate%601>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `count`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`count`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Array.ForEach%2A> to display the squares of each element in an integer array.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Array.ForEach%2A>顯示整數陣列中的每個項目的平方。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="action" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#]
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic、 C#]

trans-unit.source: The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators.
trans-unit.target: `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。

trans-unit.source: At this position, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 在這個位置上，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 並未定義。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在讀取 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 的值之前，必須呼叫 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 或 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 會將 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 設定為下一個項目。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> also return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>也會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果最後一個呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>是未定義。

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first element of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要再次將 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 之後，接著呼叫 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值對集合並沒有獨佔存取，因此列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。

trans-unit.source: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use <xref:System.Array.GetEnumerator%2A> to list the elements of an array.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Array.GetEnumerator%2A>陣列的項目列出。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> whose length needs to be determined.
trans-unit.target: 需要決定長度之 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的以零起始維度。

trans-unit.source: Gets a 32-bit integer that represents the number of elements in the specified dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得代表 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 指定維度之元素數目的 32 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the number of elements in the specified dimension.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元的整數，代表指定維度的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: An example of <xref:System.Array.GetLength%2A> is `GetLength(0)`, which returns the number of elements in the first dimension of the <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 舉例來說，<xref:System.Array.GetLength%2A>是`GetLength(0)`，它會傳回的項目數的第一個維度<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Array.GetLength%2A> to display the dimensions of two arrays with different ranks.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Array.GetLength%2A>來顯示不同等級的兩個陣列的維度。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dimension" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dimension" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="dimension" /> is equal to or greater than <see cref="P:System.Array.Rank" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dimension" /> 等於或大於 <see cref="P:System.Array.Rank" />。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> whose length needs to be determined.
trans-unit.target: 需要決定長度之 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的以零起始維度。

trans-unit.source: Gets a 64-bit integer that represents the number of elements in the specified dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得代表 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 指定維度之元素數目的 64 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit integer that represents the number of elements in the specified dimension.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元的整數，代表指定維度的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: An example of <xref:System.Array.GetLongLength%2A> is `GetLongLength(0)`, which returns the number of elements in the first dimension of the <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 舉例來說，<xref:System.Array.GetLongLength%2A>是`GetLongLength(0)`，它會傳回的項目數的第一個維度<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dimension" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dimension" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="dimension" /> is equal to or greater than <see cref="P:System.Array.Rank" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dimension" /> 等於或大於 <see cref="P:System.Array.Rank" />。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based dimension of the array whose starting index needs to be determined.
trans-unit.target: 需要決定開始索引之陣列的以零為起始的維度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the first element of the specified dimension in the array.
trans-unit.target: 取得陣列中指定之維度的第一個項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first element of the specified dimension in the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中指定之維度的第一個項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: `GetLowerBound(0)` returns the starting index of the first dimension of the array, and `GetLowerBound(Rank - 1)` returns the starting index of the last dimension of the array.
trans-unit.target: `GetLowerBound(0)` 傳回陣列的第一個維度的起始索引和`GetLowerBound(Rank - 1)`傳回陣列的最後一個維度的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A> method always returns a value that indicates the index of the lower bound of the array, even if the array is empty.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A>方法一律會傳回值，指出索引陣列的下限即使陣列是空的。

trans-unit.source: Note that, although most arrays in the .NET Framework are zero-based (that is, the <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A> method returns zero for each dimension of an array), the .NET Framework does support arrays that are not zero-based.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，雖然大部分的陣列，在.NET Framework 是以零為起始 (也就是<xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A>方法會傳回零的陣列，每個維度)，.NET Framework 支援不是以零為起始的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Such arrays can be created with the <xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%28System.Type%2CSystem.Int32%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%5B%5D%29> method, and can also be returned from unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用建立這類陣列<xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%28System.Type%2CSystem.Int32%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%5B%5D%29>方法，和也會傳回從 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A> and <xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A> methods to display the bounds of a one-dimensional and two-dimensional array and to display the values of their array elements.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A>和<xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A>方法以顯示一維和二維陣列的界限，並顯示其陣列元素的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dimension" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dimension" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="dimension" /> is equal to or greater than <see cref="P:System.Array.Rank" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dimension" /> 等於或大於 <see cref="P:System.Array.Rank" />。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based dimension of the array whose upper bound needs to be determined.
trans-unit.target: 需要決定上限之陣列的以零為起始的維度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the last element of the specified dimension in the array.
trans-unit.target: 取得陣列中指定之維度的最後一個項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the last element of the specified dimension in the array, or -1 if the specified dimension is empty.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中指定之維度的最後一個項目的索引，如果指定之維度是空的則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: `GetUpperBound(0)` returns the last index in the first dimension of the array, and `GetUpperBound(Rank - 1)` returns the last index of the last dimension of the array.
trans-unit.target: `GetUpperBound(0)` 傳回陣列的第一個維度中的最後一個索引和`GetUpperBound(Rank - 1)`傳回陣列的最後一個維度的最後一個索引。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A> and <xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A> methods to display the bounds of a one-dimensional and two-dimensional array and to display the values of their array elements.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A>和<xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A>方法以顯示一維和二維陣列的界限，並顯示其陣列元素的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified element in the current <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中指定元素的值。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the position of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> element to get.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元整數，表示要取得的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 元素的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value at the specified position in the one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中位於指定位置的值。

trans-unit.source: The index is specified as a 32-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 索引已指定為 32 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: The value at the specified position in the one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中位於指定位置的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A> and <xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A> methods can determine whether the value of `index` is out of bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A>和<xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A>方法可以判斷是否值`index`超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set and get a specific value in a one-dimensional or multidimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定並取得一維或多維陣列中的特定值。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Array" /> does not have exactly one dimension.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 不具有剛好一維的維度。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for the current <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 在目前 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的有效索引範圍之外。

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array of 32-bit integers that represent the indexes specifying the position of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> element to get.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元整數的一維陣列，代表索引，指定要取得的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 元素的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value at the specified position in the multidimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得多維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中位於指定位置的值。

trans-unit.source: The indexes are specified as an array of 32-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: 索引已指定為 32 位元整數的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The value at the specified position in the multidimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 多維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中位於指定位置的值。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in `indices` must equal the number of dimensions in the <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目數`indices`必須等於中的維度數目<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: All elements in the `indices` array must collectively specify the position of the desired element in the multidimensional <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有項目`indices`陣列必須共同指定所需項目的位置，以多維度<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A> and <xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A> methods can determine whether any of the indexes is out of bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A>和<xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A>方法可以判斷是否有任何索引超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.

trans-unit.target: 二維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中位於指定位置的值。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A>和<xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A>方法可以判斷是否有任何索引超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: The indexes are specified as 64-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: 索引已指定為 64 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: The value at the specified position in the two-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 二維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中位於指定位置的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set and get a specific value in a one-dimensional or multidimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定並取得一維或多維陣列中的特定值。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Array" /> does not have exactly three dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 不具有剛好三維的維度。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index1" /> or <paramref name="index2" /> or <paramref name="index3" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for the corresponding dimension of the current <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index1" /> 或 <paramref name="index2" /> 或 <paramref name="index3" /> 超過目前 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 對應維度的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit integer that represents the first-dimension index of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> element to get.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元整數，代表要取得的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 元素的第一維索引。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit integer that represents the second-dimension index of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> element to get.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元整數，表示要取得的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 元素的第二維索引。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit integer that represents the third-dimension index of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> element to get.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元整數，表示要取得的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 元素的第三維索引。
