trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A> and <xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A> methods can determine whether any of the indexes is out of bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A>和<xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A>方法可以判斷是否有任何索引超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set and get a specific value in a one-dimensional or multidimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定並取得一維或多維陣列中的特定值。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Array" /> does not have exactly three dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 不具有剛好三維的維度。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index1" /> or <paramref name="index2" /> or <paramref name="index3" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for the corresponding dimension of the current <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index1" /> 或 <paramref name="index2" /> 或 <paramref name="index3" /> 超過目前 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 對應維度的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of its first occurrence in a one-dimensional array or in a range of elements in the array.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的物件，並傳回其在一維陣列或陣列中某個項目範圍內第一次出現的索引。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of its first occurrence in a one-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的物件，並傳回一維陣列中第一個相符項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> in <paramref name="array" />, if found; otherwise, the lower bound of the array minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 如有找到，則為 <paramref name="array" /> 中 <paramref name="value" /> 第一個相符項目的索引；否則為陣列的下限減 1。

trans-unit.source: This method searches all the elements of a one-dimensional arrayfor `value`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會搜尋的一維 arrayfor 的所有項目`value`。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling each element's `Equals` method until it finds a match.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否`value`存在於`array`，此方法會藉由呼叫每個項目執行相等比較`Equals`方法，直到找到相符項目。

trans-unit.source: This means that if the element overrides the <xref:System.Object.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, that override is called.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，如果項目會覆寫<xref:System.Object.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>呼叫方法，覆寫。

trans-unit.source: Because most arrays have a lower bound of zero, this method generally returns –1 if`value` isn’t found.
trans-unit.target: 因為大部分的陣列都具有下限為零，這個方法通常會傳回 – 1 如果`value`找不到。

trans-unit.source: In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to <xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>(0x80000000) and `value` isn’t found, this method returns <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> (0x7FFFFFFF).
trans-unit.target: 在少數情況下，陣列的下限等於<xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>(0x80000000) 和`value`找不到，這個方法會傳回<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>(0x7FFFFFFF)。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The example calls the following three overloads of the <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%2A> method to find the index of a string in a string array:
trans-unit.target: 此範例會呼叫下列三個多載的<xref:System.Array.IndexOf%2A>方法來尋找字串陣列中字串的索引：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%29>, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%29>以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"字串陣列中。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Int32%29>, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in the fourth to the last elements of a string array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Int32%29>以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"中的第四個字串陣列的最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array from the element that follows the last successful match to the end of the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"中的字串陣列從陣列結尾後面次成功比對的項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the search.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: 0 (zero) is valid in an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 0 (零) 在空白陣列中有效。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object in a range of elements of a one-dimensional array, and returns the index of its first occurrence.
trans-unit.target: 在一維陣列的項目範圍中搜尋指定的物件，並傳回其第一次出現的索引。

trans-unit.source: The range extends from a specified index to the end of the array.
trans-unit.target: 此範圍從指定的索引延伸到陣列的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="value" />, if it’s found, within the range of elements in <paramref name="array" /> that extends from <paramref name="startIndex" /> to the last element; otherwise, the lower bound of the array minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 如有找到，則為 <paramref name="array" /> 中從 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 延伸至最後一個元素的元素範圍內，<paramref name="value" /> 第一個發生的索引；否則為陣列的下限減 1。

trans-unit.source: This method searches a one-dimensional array from the element at index `startIndex` to the last element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會搜尋索引處的項目從一維陣列`startIndex`最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling the `Equals` method of every element until it finds a match.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否`value`存在於`array`，此方法會藉由呼叫執行相等比較`Equals`方法的每個項目，直到找到相符項目。

trans-unit.source: This means that if the element overrides the <xref:System.Object.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, that override is called.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，如果項目會覆寫<xref:System.Object.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>呼叫方法，覆寫。

trans-unit.source: Because most arrays have a lower bound of zero, this method generally returns –1 if `value` isn’t found.
trans-unit.target: 因為大部分的陣列都具有下限為零，這個方法通常會傳回 – 1 如果`value`找不到。

trans-unit.source: In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to <xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>(0x80000000) and `value` isn’t found, this method returns <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> (0x7FFFFFFF).
trans-unit.target: 在少數情況下，陣列的下限等於<xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>(0x80000000) 和`value`找不到，這個方法會傳回<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>(0x7FFFFFFF)。

trans-unit.source: If `startIndex` equals <xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>,the method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果`startIndex`等於<xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，方法會傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: If `startIndex` is greater than <xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`startIndex`大於<xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，方法會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements from `startIndex` to the end of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是從元素數目`startIndex`結尾`array`。

trans-unit.source: The example calls the following three overloads of the <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%2A> method to find the index of a string in a string array:
trans-unit.target: 此範例會呼叫下列三個多載的<xref:System.Array.IndexOf%2A>方法來尋找字串陣列中字串的索引：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%29>, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%29>以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"字串陣列中。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Int32%29>, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in the fourth to the last elements of a string array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Int32%29>以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"中的第四個字串陣列的最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array from the element that follows the last successful match to the end of the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"中的字串陣列從陣列結尾後面次成功比對的項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="array" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the search.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: 0 (zero) is valid in an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 0 (零) 在空白陣列中有效。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object in a range of elements of a one-dimensional array, and returns the index of ifs first occurrence.
trans-unit.target: 在一維陣列的項目範圍中搜尋指定的物件，並傳回其第一次出現的索引。

trans-unit.source: The range extends from a specified index for a specified number of elements.
trans-unit.target: 此範圍的延伸起點為指定項目數的指定索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="value" />, if it’s found in the <paramref name="array" /> from index <paramref name="startIndex" /> to <paramref name="startIndex" /> + <paramref name="count" /> - 1; otherwise, the lower bound of the array minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 如有找到，則為 <paramref name="array" /> 中從索引 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 到 <paramref name="startIndex" /> + <paramref name="count" /> -1 的範圍內，<paramref name="value" /> 第一個相符項目的索引；否則為陣列的下限減 1。

trans-unit.source: This method searches the elements of a one-dimensional arrayfrom `startIndex` to `startIndex` plus `count` minus 1, if `count` is greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會搜尋的一維 arrayfrom 項目`startIndex`至`startIndex`加上`count`減 1，如果`count`大於 0。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling the `Equals` method of every element until it finds a match.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否`value`存在於`array`，此方法會藉由呼叫執行相等比較`Equals`方法的每個項目，直到找到相符項目。

trans-unit.source: This means that if the element overrides the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, that override is called.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，如果項目會覆寫<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>呼叫方法，覆寫。

trans-unit.source: Becausemost arrays have a lower bound of zero, this method generally returns –1 when `value` isn’t found.
trans-unit.target: Becausemost 陣列的下限為零，這個方法通常會傳回-1 時`value`找不到。

trans-unit.source: In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to <xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> (0x80000000) and `value` isn’t found, this method returns <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> (0x7FFFFFFF).
trans-unit.target: 在少數情況下，陣列的下限等於<xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>(0x80000000) 和`value`找不到，這個方法會傳回<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>(0x7FFFFFFF)。

trans-unit.source: If `startindex` equals <xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果`startindex`等於<xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，方法會傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: If `startIndex` is greater than <xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`startIndex`大於<xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，方法會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `count`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`count`。

trans-unit.source: The example calls the following three overloads of the <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%2A> method to find the index of a string in a string array:
trans-unit.target: 此範例會呼叫下列三個多載的<xref:System.Array.IndexOf%2A>方法來尋找字串陣列中字串的索引：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%29>, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%29>以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"字串陣列中。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Int32%29>, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in the fourth to the last elements of a string array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Int32%29>以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"中的第四個字串陣列的最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array from the element that follows the last successful match to the end of the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%28System.Array%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"中的字串陣列從陣列結尾後面次成功比對的項目。

trans-unit.source: To determine the value of the `count` argument, it subtracts the upper bound of the array from the starting index and adds one.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷的值`count`引數，它減去從起始的索引陣列的上限，並新增一個。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="array" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="startIndex" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not specify a valid section in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 未指定 <paramref name="array" /> 中的有效區段。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based array to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維、以零為起始的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of its first occurrence in a one-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的物件，並傳回一維陣列中第一個相符項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> in the entire <paramref name="array" />, if found; otherwise, –1.
trans-unit.target: 整個 <paramref name="array" /> 中第一個出現 <paramref name="value" /> 之以零為起始的索引 (如有找到)，如未找到則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: This method searches all the elements of a one-dimensional array for `value`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會搜尋的一維陣列的所有項目`value`。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling the `T.Equals` method on every element.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否`value`存在於`array`，此方法會藉由呼叫執行相等比較`T.Equals`每個項目上的方法。

trans-unit.source: This means that if `T` overrides the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method, that override is called.
trans-unit.target: 這表示如果`T`會覆寫<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>呼叫方法，覆寫。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範三種一般的所有多載<xref:System.Array.IndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5.
trans-unit.target: 將建立字串陣列，一個會出現兩次，在索引位置 0 和 5 的索引位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29> method overload searches the array from the beginning, and finds the first occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29>方法多載開始時，從陣列中搜尋和尋找字串的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search the array beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the end of the array, and finds the second occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法多載用於搜尋的索引位置 3 開頭的陣列和陣列的結尾繼續，並尋找字串的第二個項目。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search a range of two entries, beginning at index location two; it returns –1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range.
trans-unit.target: 最後，<xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法多載用來搜尋指定範圍的開頭的索引位置 2 的兩個項目; 它會傳回 – 1，因為沒有在該範圍內的搜尋字串的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based array to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維、以零為起始的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the search.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋之以零為起始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: 0 (zero) is valid in an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 0 (零) 在空白陣列中有效。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object in a range of elements of a one dimensional array, and returns the index of its first occurrence.
trans-unit.target: 在一維陣列的項目範圍中搜尋指定的物件，並傳回其第一次出現的索引。

trans-unit.source: The range extends from a specified index to the end of the array.
trans-unit.target: 此範圍從指定的索引延伸到陣列的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the range of elements in <paramref name="array" /> that extends from <paramref name="startIndex" /> to the last element, if found; otherwise, –1.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="value" /> 中從 <paramref name="array" /> 延伸到最後一個項目的元素範圍內，<paramref name="startIndex" /> 的第一個相符項目之以零起始的索引 (如果找到的話)，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: This method searches a one-dimensional array from the element at `startIndex` to the end of the array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會搜尋處的項目從一維陣列`startIndex`陣列的結尾。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling the `T.Equals` method on every element.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否`value`存在於`array`，此方法會藉由呼叫執行相等比較`T.Equals`每個項目上的方法。

trans-unit.source: This means that if `T` overrides the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method, that override is called.
trans-unit.target: 這表示如果`T`會覆寫<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>呼叫方法，覆寫。

trans-unit.source: If `startIndex` equals <xref:System.Array.Length%2A>,the method returns -1.If `startIndex` is greater than <xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`startIndex`等於<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>，方法會傳回-1.If`startIndex`大於<xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，方法會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements from `startIndex` to the end of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是從元素數目`startIndex`結尾`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範三種一般的所有多載<xref:System.Array.IndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5.
trans-unit.target: 將建立字串陣列，一個會出現兩次，在索引位置 0 和 5 的索引位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29> method overload searches the array from the beginning, and finds the first occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29>方法多載開始時，從陣列中搜尋和尋找字串的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search the array beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the end of the array, and finds the second occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法多載用於搜尋的索引位置 3 開頭的陣列和陣列的結尾繼續，並尋找字串的第二個項目。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search a range of two entries, beginning at index location two; it returns –1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range.
trans-unit.target: 最後，<xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法多載用來搜尋指定範圍的開頭的索引位置 2 的兩個項目; 它會傳回 – 1，因為沒有在該範圍內的搜尋字串的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="array" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based array to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維、以零為起始的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the search.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋之以零為起始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: 0 (zero) is valid in an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 0 (零) 在空白陣列中有效。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the section to search.
trans-unit.target: 區段中要搜尋的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object in a range of elements of a one-dimensional array, and returns the index of its first occurrence.
trans-unit.target: 在一維陣列的項目範圍中搜尋指定的物件，並傳回其第一次出現的索引。

trans-unit.source: The range extends from a specified index for a specified number of elements.
trans-unit.target: 此範圍的延伸起點為指定項目數的指定索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the range of elements in <paramref name="array" /> that starts at <paramref name="startIndex" /> and contains the number of elements specified in <paramref name="count" />, if found; otherwise, –1.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="value" /> 中從 <paramref name="array" /> 開始且包含 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 內指定之元素數的元素範圍內之 <paramref name="count" /> 的第一個相符項目之以零起始的索引 (如果有找到)，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: This method searchesthe elements of a one-dimensional array from `startIndex` to `startIndex` plus `count` minus 1, if `count` is greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法 searchesthe 項目從一維陣列的`startIndex`至`startIndex`加上`count`減 1，如果`count`大於 0。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling the `T.Equals` method on every element.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否`value`存在於`array`，此方法會藉由呼叫執行相等比較`T.Equals`每個項目上的方法。

trans-unit.source: This means that if `T` overrides the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method, that override is called.
trans-unit.target: 這表示如果`T`會覆寫<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>呼叫方法，覆寫。

trans-unit.source: If `startIndex` equals <xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果`startIndex`等於<xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，方法會傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: If `startIndex` is greater than <xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`startIndex`大於<xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，方法會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `count`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`count`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範三種一般的所有多載<xref:System.Array.IndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5.
trans-unit.target: 將建立字串陣列，一個會出現兩次，在索引位置 0 和 5 的索引位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29> method overload searches the array from the beginning, and finds the first occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29>方法多載開始時，從陣列中搜尋和尋找字串的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search the array beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the end of the array, and finds the second occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法多載用於搜尋的索引位置 3 開頭的陣列和陣列的結尾繼續，並尋找字串的第二個項目。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search a range of two entries, beginning at index location two; it returns –1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range.
trans-unit.target: 最後，<xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法多載用來搜尋指定範圍的開頭的索引位置 2 的兩個項目; 它會傳回 – 1，因為沒有在該範圍內的搜尋字串的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="array" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="startIndex" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not specify a valid section in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 未指定 <paramref name="array" /> 中的有效區段。

trans-unit.source: Initializes every element of the value-type <see cref="T:System.Array" /> by calling the default constructor of the value type.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫實值型別的預設建構函式，初始化實值型別 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的每個元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is designed to help compilers support value-type arrays; most users do not need this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法被設計來協助編譯器支援實值型別陣列。大部分的使用者不需要這個方法。

trans-unit.source: It must not be used on reference-type arrays.
trans-unit.target: 它必須不能參考型別陣列上。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Array> is not a value-type <xref:System.Array> or if the value type does not have a default constructor, the <xref:System.Array> is not modified.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array>不是實值類型<xref:System.Array>或實值型別沒有預設建構函式，如果<xref:System.Array>則不會修改。

trans-unit.source: The value-type <xref:System.Array> can have any lower bound and any number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 實值型別<xref:System.Array>可以有任何的下限和任何數目的維度。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Array.Length%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method only on value types that have constructors; however, value types that are native to C# do not have constructors.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法只能在具有建構函式; 實值類型上不過，原生 C# 的實值類型沒有建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 是否有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: This property is always <see langword="true" /> for all arrays.
trans-unit.target: 所有陣列的這個屬性永遠為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array> implements the <xref:System.Array.IsFixedSize%2A> property because it is required by the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array> 實作<xref:System.Array.IsFixedSize%2A>屬性因為的需要<xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面。

trans-unit.source: An array with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the array is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements.
trans-unit.target: 具有固定大小陣列不允許在建立陣列，但允許修改現有的項目後新增或移除項目。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 是否唯讀。

trans-unit.source: This property is always <see langword="false" /> for all arrays.
trans-unit.target: 所有陣列的這個屬性永遠為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array> implements the <xref:System.Array.IsReadOnly%2A> property because it is required by the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array> 實作<xref:System.Array.IsReadOnly%2A>屬性因為的需要<xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面。

trans-unit.source: An array that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the array is created.
trans-unit.target: 陣列是唯讀的不允許陣列建立後增加、 移除或修改項目。

trans-unit.source: If you require a read-only collection, use a <xref:System.Collections> class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要唯讀集合，使用<xref:System.Collections>類別可實作<xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面。

trans-unit.source: If you cast or convert an array to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface object, the <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您轉型或轉換至陣列<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面物件<xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: However, if you cast or convert an array to a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> interface, the `IsReadOnly` property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您轉型或轉換至陣列<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>介面，`IsReadOnly`屬性會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示對 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的存取是否同步 (安全執行緒)。

trans-unit.source: This property is always <see langword="false" /> for all arrays.
trans-unit.target: 所有陣列的這個屬性永遠為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array> implements the <xref:System.Array.IsSynchronized%2A> property because it is required by the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array> 實作<xref:System.Array.IsSynchronized%2A>屬性因為的需要<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework classes based on <xref:System.Array> provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the <xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 類別根據<xref:System.Array>提供自己的集合的同步化的版本<xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Classes that use arrays can also implement their own synchronization using the <xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用陣列的類別也可以實作自己的同步處理使用<xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the `SyncRoot` of the collection, not directly on the collection.
trans-unit.target: 同步處理的程式碼必須在上執行作業`SyncRoot`的集合，而不是直接在集合。

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection.
trans-unit.target: 具體而言，保持正常的同步處理與其他可能同時修改集合的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Note that some implementations of <xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A> might return the <xref:System.Array> itself.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，某些實作<xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A>可能會傳回<xref:System.Array>本身。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並不是執行緒安全的程序。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to lock an array during the entire enumeration by using the <xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何在整個列舉過程中鎖定陣列使用<xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the last occurrence of a value in a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> or in a portion of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的某部分中數值的最後一個相符項目索引。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of the last occurrence within the entire one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定物件，並且傳回整個一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中最後一個相符項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the entire <paramref name="array" />, if found; otherwise, the lower bound of the array minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到的話，則為整個 <paramref name="value" /> 中 <paramref name="array" /> 的最後一個相符項目的索引，否則為陣列的下限減 1。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> is searched backward starting at the last element and ending at the first element.
trans-unit.target: 一維<xref:System.Array>向後的最後一個項目開始和結束時間的第一個項目中搜尋。

trans-unit.source: The elements are compared to the specified value using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 項目與指定的值使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目類型為非內建 （使用者定義） 的類型，`Equals`會使用該類型的實作。

trans-unit.source: Since most arrays will have a lower bound of zero, this method would generally return –1 when `value` is not found.
trans-unit.target: 因為大部分的陣列都有下限為零，所以這個方法通常會傳回-1 時`value`找不到。

trans-unit.source: In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to <xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> and `value` is not found, this method returns <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which is `System.Int32.MinValue - 1`.
trans-unit.target: 在少數情況下，陣列的下限等於<xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>和`value`找不到，這個方法會傳回<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，也就是`System.Int32.MinValue - 1`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method uses the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Array> to determine whether the <xref:System.Object> specified by the `value` parameter exists.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，這個方法會使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法<xref:System.Array>來判斷是否<xref:System.Object>所指定`value`參數存在。

trans-unit.source: In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the `value`<xref:System.Object> itself.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，藉由進行這項判斷<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`value`<xref:System.Object>本身。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> 方法的`item`參數集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to determine the index of the last occurrence of a specified element in an array.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷陣列中指定的項目，最後一個出現的索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the backward search.
trans-unit.target: 反向搜尋的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of the last occurrence within the range of elements in the one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that extends from the first element to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的物件，並傳回一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 內從第一個元素延伸至指定之索引的元素範圍中，最後一個相符項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the range of elements in <paramref name="array" /> that extends from the first element to <paramref name="startIndex" />, if found; otherwise, the lower bound of the array minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到的話，則為 <paramref name="value" /> 中從第一個元素延伸到 <paramref name="array" /> 的元素範圍內，<paramref name="startIndex" /> 的最後一個相符項目的索引，否則為陣列的下限減 1。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the first element.
trans-unit.target: 一維<xref:System.Array>是搜尋回溯開始`startIndex`和結束時間的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The elements are compared to the specified value using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 項目與指定的值使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目類型為非內建 （使用者定義） 的類型，`Equals`會使用該類型的實作。

trans-unit.source: Since most arrays will have a lower bound of zero, this method would generally return –1 when `value` is not found.
trans-unit.target: 因為大部分的陣列都有下限為零，所以這個方法通常會傳回-1 時`value`找不到。

trans-unit.source: In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to <xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> and `value` is not found, this method returns <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which is `System.Int32.MinValue - 1`.
trans-unit.target: 在少數情況下，陣列的下限等於<xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>和`value`找不到，這個方法會傳回<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，也就是`System.Int32.MinValue - 1`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements from the beginning of `array` to `startIndex`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是從開頭的項目數`array`至`startIndex`。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method uses the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Array> to determine whether the <xref:System.Object> specified by the `value` parameter exists.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，這個方法會使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法<xref:System.Array>來判斷是否<xref:System.Object>所指定`value`參數存在。

trans-unit.source: In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the `value`<xref:System.Object> itself.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，藉由進行這項判斷<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`value`<xref:System.Object>本身。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to determine the index of the last occurrence of a specified element in an array.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷陣列中指定的項目，最後一個出現的索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="array" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the backward search.
trans-unit.target: 反向搜尋的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the section to search.
trans-unit.target: 區段中要搜尋的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of the last occurrence within the range of elements in the one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the specified number of elements and ends at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的物件，並傳回一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中包含指定之元素數且結束於指定之索引的元素範圍內，最後一個相符項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the range of elements in <paramref name="array" /> that contains the number of elements specified in <paramref name="count" /> and ends at <paramref name="startIndex" />, if found; otherwise, the lower bound of the array minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到的話，則為在 <paramref name="value" /> 中包含 <paramref name="array" /> 內指定之元素數且結束於 <paramref name="count" /> 的元素範圍內，<paramref name="startIndex" /> 的最後一個相符項目之索引，否則為陣列的下限減 1。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` minus `count` plus 1, if `count` is greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: 一維<xref:System.Array>是搜尋回溯開始`startIndex`結束為`startIndex`減去`count`再加上 1，如果`count`大於 0。

trans-unit.source: The elements are compared to the specified value using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 項目與指定的值使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the`Equals` implementation of that type is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目類型為非內建 （使用者定義） 的類型，`Equals`會使用該類型的實作。

trans-unit.source: Since most arrays will have a lower bound of zero, this method would generally return –1 when `value` is not found.
trans-unit.target: 因為大部分的陣列都有下限為零，所以這個方法通常會傳回-1 時`value`找不到。

trans-unit.source: In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to <xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> and `value` is not found, this method returns <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which is `System.Int32.MinValue - 1`.
trans-unit.target: 在少數情況下，陣列的下限等於<xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>和`value`找不到，這個方法會傳回<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，也就是`System.Int32.MinValue - 1`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `count`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`count`。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method uses the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Array> to determine whether the <xref:System.Object> specified by the `value` parameter exists.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，這個方法會使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法<xref:System.Array>來判斷是否<xref:System.Object>所指定`value`參數存在。

trans-unit.source: In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the `value`<xref:System.Object> itself.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，藉由進行這項判斷<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`value`<xref:System.Object>本身。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to determine the index of the last occurrence of a specified element in an array.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷陣列中指定的項目，最後一個出現的索引。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%2A> method is a backward search; therefore, `count` must be less than or equal to (`startIndex` minus the lower bound of the array plus 1).
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%2A>方法是向後搜尋; 因此，`count`必須小於或等於 (`startIndex`陣列加 1 的下限減)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="array" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="startIndex" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not specify a valid section in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 未指定 <paramref name="array" /> 中的有效區段。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維且以零為起始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of the last occurrence within the entire <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的物件，並傳回整個 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中最後一個相符項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the entire <paramref name="array" />, if found; otherwise, –1.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到，則是在整個 <paramref name="value" /> 內，<paramref name="array" /> 最後一次出現的以零起始的索引，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> is searched backward starting at the last element and ending at the first element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>向後的最後一個項目開始和結束時間的第一個項目中搜尋。

trans-unit.source: The elements are compared to the specified value using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 項目與指定的值使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目類型為非內建 （使用者定義） 的類型，`Equals`會使用該類型的實作。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範三種一般的所有多載<xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5.
trans-unit.target: 將建立字串陣列，一個會出現兩次，在索引位置 0 和 5 的索引位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29> method overload searches the entire array from the end, and finds the second occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29>方法多載整個結束時，從陣列中搜尋和尋找字串的第二個項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search the array backward beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the beginning of the array, and finds the first occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法多載用來與索引位置 3 回溯開始的陣列和陣列的開頭繼續搜尋和尋找字串的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search a range of four entries, beginning at index location 4 and extending backward (that is, it searches the items at locations 4, 3, 2, and 1); this search returns –1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range.
trans-unit.target: 最後，<xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法多載用於範圍之四個項目，索引位置 4 開始，並擴充向後搜尋 （也就是說，它會搜尋的項目在位置 4、 3、 2 和 1）; 此搜尋會傳回 – 1，因為沒有搜尋的執行個體在該範圍內的字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維且以零為起始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the backward search.
trans-unit.target: 向後搜尋之以零為起始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of the last occurrence within the range of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that extends from the first element to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的物件，並傳回在 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 內從第一個元素延伸至指定之索引的元素範圍中，最後一個相符項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the range of elements in <paramref name="array" /> that extends from the first element to <paramref name="startIndex" />, if found; otherwise, –1.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="value" /> 中從第一個元素延伸到 <paramref name="array" /> 的元素範圍內，<paramref name="startIndex" /> 的最後一個相符項目之以零起始的索引 (如果找到的話)，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the first element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>是搜尋回溯開始`startIndex`和結束時間的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The elements are compared to the specified value using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 項目與指定的值使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目類型為非內建 （使用者定義） 的類型，`Equals`會使用該類型的實作。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements from the beginning of `array` to `startIndex`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是從開頭的項目數`array`至`startIndex`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範三種一般的所有多載<xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5.
trans-unit.target: 將建立字串陣列，一個會出現兩次，在索引位置 0 和 5 的索引位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29> method overload searches the entire array from the end, and finds the second occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29>方法多載整個結束時，從陣列中搜尋和尋找字串的第二個項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search the array backward beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the beginning of the array, and finds the first occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法多載用來與索引位置 3 回溯開始的陣列和陣列的開頭繼續搜尋和尋找字串的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search a range of four entries, beginning at index location 4 and extending backward (that is, it searches the items at locations 4, 3, 2, and 1); this search returns –1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range.
trans-unit.target: 最後，<xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法多載用於範圍之四個項目，索引位置 4 開始，並擴充向後搜尋 （也就是說，它會搜尋的項目在位置 4、 3、 2 和 1）; 此搜尋會傳回 – 1，因為沒有搜尋的執行個體在該範圍內的字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="array" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的一維且以零為起始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the backward search.
trans-unit.target: 向後搜尋之以零為起始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the section to search.
trans-unit.target: 區段中要搜尋的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of the last occurrence within the range of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the specified number of elements and ends at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的物件，並傳回 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中包含指定之元素數且結束於指定之索引的元素範圍內，最後一個相符項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the range of elements in <paramref name="array" /> that contains the number of elements specified in <paramref name="count" /> and ends at <paramref name="startIndex" />, if found; otherwise, –1.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="value" /> 中包含 <paramref name="array" /> 內指定之元素數且結束於 <paramref name="count" /> 的元素範圍內，<paramref name="startIndex" /> 的最後一個相符項目之以零起始的索引 (如果有找到)，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` minus `count` plus 1, if `count` is greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>是搜尋回溯開始`startIndex`結束為`startIndex`減去`count`再加上 1，如果`count`大於 0。

trans-unit.source: The elements are compared to the specified value using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 項目與指定的值使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目類型為非內建 （使用者定義） 的類型，`Equals`會使用該類型的實作。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `count`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`count`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範三種一般的所有多載<xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5.
trans-unit.target: 將建立字串陣列，一個會出現兩次，在索引位置 0 和 5 的索引位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29> method overload searches the entire array from the end, and finds the second occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29>方法多載整個結束時，從陣列中搜尋和尋找字串的第二個項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search the array backward beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the beginning of the array, and finds the first occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法多載用來與索引位置 3 回溯開始的陣列和陣列的開頭繼續搜尋和尋找字串的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search a range of four entries, beginning at index location 4 and extending backward (that is, it searches the items at locations 4, 3, 2, and 1); this search returns –1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range.
trans-unit.target: 最後，<xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法多載用於範圍之四個項目，索引位置 4 開始，並擴充向後搜尋 （也就是說，它會搜尋的項目在位置 4、 3、 2 和 1）; 此搜尋會傳回 – 1，因為沒有搜尋的執行個體在該範圍內的字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="array" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="startIndex" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not specify a valid section in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 未指定 <paramref name="array" /> 中的有效區段。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of elements in all the dimensions of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 所有維度的元素總數。

trans-unit.source: The total number of elements in all the dimensions of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />; zero if there are no elements in the array.
trans-unit.target: 所有維度的項目總數<see cref="T:System.Array" />，則為零的陣列中有任何項目。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> property to get the total number of elements in an array.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>屬性來取得陣列中的項目總數。

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A> method to determine the number of elements in each dimension of a multidimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 它也會使用<xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A>方法，以判斷每個維度的多維陣列中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The array is multidimensional and contains more than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 陣列是多維的且包含多個<see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a 64-bit integer that represents the total number of elements in all the dimensions of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得代表 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 所有維度的元素總數之 64 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit integer that represents the total number of elements in all the dimensions of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元的整數，代表 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 所有維度的元素總數。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rank (number of dimensions) of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的陣序 (維度數目)。

trans-unit.source: For example, a one-dimensional array returns 1, a two-dimensional array returns 2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一維陣列傳回 1，二維陣列傳回 2，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: The rank (number of dimensions) of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的陣序規範 (維度數目)。

trans-unit.source: For example, the Visual Basic code
trans-unit.target: 例如，Visual Basic 程式碼

trans-unit.source: and the C# code
trans-unit.target: 和 C# 程式碼

trans-unit.source: create an array of three dimensions with a <xref:System.Array.Rank%2A> property whose value is 3.
trans-unit.target: 建立具有三個維度的陣列<xref:System.Array.Rank%2A>屬性值為 3。

trans-unit.source: A jagged array (an array of arrays) is a one-dimensional array; the value of its <xref:System.Array.Rank%2A> property is 1.
trans-unit.target: 不規則的陣列 （陣列的陣列） 是一維陣列。值及其<xref:System.Array.Rank%2A>屬性為 1。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a one-dimensional array, a two-dimensional array, and a jagged array, and retrieves the <xref:System.Array.Rank%2A> property of each.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會初始化一維陣列、 二維陣列和不規則的陣列，並擷取<xref:System.Array.Rank%2A>每個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based array to resize, or <see langword="null" /> to create a new array with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 要調整大小之以零為起始的一維陣列，或是 <see langword="null" />，表示要以指定之大小建立新陣列。

trans-unit.source: The size of the new array.
trans-unit.target: 新陣列的大小。

trans-unit.source: Changes the number of elements of a one-dimensional array to the specified new size.
trans-unit.target: 將一維陣列中的項目數目變更為指定的新大小。

trans-unit.source: This method allocates a new array with the specified size, copies elements from the old array to the new one, and then replaces the old array with the new one.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會配置新的陣列，以指定的大小、 從舊的陣列項目複製到新的專案，，然後以新的取代舊的陣列。

trans-unit.source: `array` must be a one-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: `array` 必須是一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: If `array` is `null`, this method creates a new array with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 如果`array`是`null`，這個方法會建立新的陣列，以指定的大小。

trans-unit.source: If `newSize` is greater than the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of the old array, a new array is allocated and all the elements are copied from the old array to the new one.
trans-unit.target: 如果`newSize`大於<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的舊的陣列，會配置新的陣列和所有項目會從舊的陣列複製到新的專案。

trans-unit.source: If `newSize` is less than the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of the old array, a new array is allocated and elements are copied from the old array to the new one until the new one is filled; the rest of the elements in the old array are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果`newSize`是小於<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的舊的陣列，會配置新的陣列和項目複製從舊的陣列轉換為新直到新的填滿; 舊陣列中元素的其餘部分會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If `newSize` is equal to the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of the old array, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果`newSize`等於<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的舊的陣列，這個方法不會執行任何動作。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `newSize`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`newSize`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Resize%2A> method resizes a one-dimensional array only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Resize%2A>方法調整大小，只是一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> class does not include a method for resizing multi-dimensional arrays.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>類別不包含調整大小的多維陣列的方法。

trans-unit.source: To do this, you must either provide your own code or call a special-purpose method in a third-party library.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，您必須提供自己的程式碼，或呼叫協力廠商的文件庫中的特殊用途的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates one possible implementation for a method that resizes an array of *n* dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼將說明可能會調整大小的陣列方法實作*n*維度。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how resizing affects the array.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何調整大小會影響陣列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="newSize" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newSize" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: Reverses the order of the elements in a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> or in a portion of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 反轉一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 某部分中的元素順序。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to reverse.
trans-unit.target: 要反轉的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: Reverses the sequence of the elements in the entire one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 反轉整個一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的元素順序。

trans-unit.source: After a call to this method, the element at `myArray[i]`, where `i` is any index in the array, moves to `myArray[j]`, where `j` equals `(myArray.Length + myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - (i - myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - 1`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法，處的項目之後`myArray[i]`，其中`i`是陣列中的任何索引，將移至`myArray[j]`，其中`j`等於`(myArray.Length + myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - (i - myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - 1`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: As the following example shows, the <xref:System.Array.Reverse%2A> method can be used to reverse a jagged array.
trans-unit.target: 如下列範例所示，<xref:System.Array.Reverse%2A>方法可用來反向不規則的陣列。

trans-unit.source: It initializes a jagged array with one element for each month of the current year in the current culture's calendar.
trans-unit.target: 它會初始化今年目前文化特性的日曆中的每個月的不規則的陣列，含有一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Each element contains an array with as many elements as that month has days.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目包含與該月有天的元素的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The example displays the contents of the array, calls the <xref:System.Array.Reverse%2A> method, and then displays the contents of the reversed array.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會顯示為陣列，呼叫的內容<xref:System.Array.Reverse%2A>方法，然後按一下 顯示反轉陣列的內容。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to reverse the sort of the values in an <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何反向中值的排序<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to reverse.
trans-unit.target: 要反轉的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the section to reverse.
trans-unit.target: 要反轉之區段的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the section to reverse.
trans-unit.target: 區段中要反轉的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Reverses the sequence of the elements in a range of elements in the one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 將一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中某個範圍的元素之元素順序顛倒。

trans-unit.source: After a call to this method, the element at `myArray[i]`, where `i` is any index in the array, moves to `myArray[j]`, where `j` equals `(myArray.Length + myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - (i - myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - 1`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法，處的項目之後`myArray[i]`，其中`i`是陣列中的任何索引，將移至`myArray[j]`，其中`j`等於`(myArray.Length + myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - (i - myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - 1`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Reverse%2A> method can be used to reverse a jagged array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Reverse%2A>方法可用來反向不規則的陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to reverse the sort of the values in a range of elements in an <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何反向範圍中的項目中的值排序<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than the lower bound of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 <paramref name="array" /> 的下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="length" /> do not specify a valid range in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="length" /> 未指定 <paramref name="array" /> 中的有效範圍。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified element in the current <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的指定元素設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The new value for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 指定項目的新值。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the position of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> element to set.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元整數，表示要設定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 元素的位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets a value to the element at the specified position in the one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中指定位置之元素的值。

trans-unit.source: The index is specified as a 32-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 索引已指定為 32 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A> and <xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A> methods can determine whether the value of `index` is out of bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A>和<xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A>方法可以判斷是否值`index`超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: For more information about conversions, see <xref:System.Convert>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Convert>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Array.SetValue%2A> is used to assign `null` to an element of an array of value types, all fields of the element are initialized to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array.SetValue%2A>用來指派`null`實值類型陣列的項目，項目的所有欄位都初始化為零。

trans-unit.source: The value of the element is not a null reference, and cannot be found by searching for a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 元素的值不是 null 參考，並無法找到所搜尋的 null 參考。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set and get a specific value in a one-dimensional or multidimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定並取得一維或多維陣列中的特定值。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Array" /> does not have exactly one dimension.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 不具有剛好一維的維度。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> cannot be cast to the element type of the current <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 不可以將 <paramref name="value" /> 轉換成目前 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的項目型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for the current <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 在目前 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的有效索引範圍之外。

trans-unit.source: The new value for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 指定項目的新值。

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array of 32-bit integers that represent the indexes specifying the position of the element to set.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元整數的一維陣列，代表指定要設定之項目位置的索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets a value to the element at the specified position in the multidimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定多維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中指定位置之元素的值。

trans-unit.source: The indexes are specified as an array of 32-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: 索引已指定為 32 位元整數的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in `indices` must equal the number of dimensions in the <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目數`indices`必須等於中的維度數目<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: All elements in the `indices` array must collectively specify the position of the desired element in the multidimensional <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有項目`indices`陣列必須共同指定所需項目的位置，以多維度<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A> and <xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A> methods can determine whether any of the values in the `indices` array is out of bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A>和<xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A>方法可以判斷是否有任何值的`indices`陣列超出界限。

trans-unit.source: For more information about conversions, see <xref:System.Convert>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Convert>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。
