trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array.SetValue%2A>用來指派`null`實值類型陣列的項目，項目的所有欄位都初始化為零。

trans-unit.source: The value of the element is not a null reference, and cannot be found by searching for a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 元素的值不是 null 參考，並無法找到所搜尋的 null 參考。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set and get a specific value in a one-dimensional or multidimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定並取得一維或多維陣列中的特定值。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Array" /> does not have exactly three dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 不具有剛好三維的維度。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> cannot be cast to the element type of the current <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 不可以將 <paramref name="value" /> 轉換成目前 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的項目型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index1" /> or <paramref name="index2" /> or <paramref name="index3" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for the corresponding dimension of the current <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index1" /> 或 <paramref name="index2" /> 或 <paramref name="index3" /> 超過目前 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 對應維度的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: The new value for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 指定項目的新值。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit integer that represents the first-dimension index of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> element to set.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元整數，表示要設定之 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 元素的第一維索引。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit integer that represents the second-dimension index of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> element to set.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元整數，表示要設定之 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 元素的第二維索引。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit integer that represents the third-dimension index of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> element to set.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元整數，表示要設定之 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 元素的第三維索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets a value to the element at the specified position in the three-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定三維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中指定位置之元素的值。

trans-unit.source: The indexes are specified as 64-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: 索引已指定為 64 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A> and <xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A> methods can determine whether any of the indexes is out of bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A>和<xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A>方法可以判斷是否有任何索引超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: For more information about conversions, see <xref:System.Convert>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Convert>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Array.SetValue%2A> is used to assign `null` to an element of an array of value types, all fields of the element are initialized to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array.SetValue%2A>用來指派`null`實值類型陣列的項目，項目的所有欄位都初始化為零。

trans-unit.source: The value of the element is not a null reference, and cannot be found by searching for a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 元素的值不是 null 參考，並無法找到所搜尋的 null 參考。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set and get a specific value in a one-dimensional or multidimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定並取得一維或多維陣列中的特定值。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Array" /> does not have exactly three dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 不具有剛好三維的維度。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> cannot be cast to the element type of the current <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 不可以將 <paramref name="value" /> 轉換成目前 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的項目型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index1" /> or <paramref name="index2" /> or <paramref name="index3" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for the corresponding dimension of the current <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index1" /> 或 <paramref name="index2" /> 或 <paramref name="index3" /> 超過目前 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 對應維度的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in a one-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 排序一維陣列中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to sort.
trans-unit.target: 要排序的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in an entire one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each element of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的每個元素的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 實作，排序整個一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Each element of `array` must implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目`array`必須實作<xref:System.IComparable>介面中的項目比較能夠`array`。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料分割數目超過 2 * 記錄<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to sort the values in an <xref:System.Array> using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何排序值<xref:System.Array>使用預設比較子和自訂比較子，會反轉排序順序。

trans-unit.source: Note that the result might vary depending on the current <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，結果可能會有所不同目前<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: One or more elements in <paramref name="array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 中的一個或多個元素沒有實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the keys to sort.
trans-unit.target: 一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，包含要排序的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the items that correspond to each of the keys in the <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，包含對應至 <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中每個索引鍵的項目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" /> to sort only the <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> 表示只排序 <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: Sorts a pair of one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each key.
trans-unit.target: 使用每個索引鍵的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 實作，根據第一個 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的索引鍵，排序一對一維的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 物件 (一個物件包含索引鍵，另一個物件包含對應的項目)。

trans-unit.source: Each key in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> has a corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 在每個索引鍵`keys`<xref:System.Array>中有對應的項目`items` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array> is similarly repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵排序期間，在對應的項目時重新定位`items`<xref:System.Array>同樣會重新調整位置。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the `items`<xref:System.Array> is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 因此， `items` <xref:System.Array>根據對應中的索引鍵的排列方式排序`keys` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: Each key in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> must implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key.
trans-unit.target: 在每個索引鍵`keys`<xref:System.Array>必須實作<xref:System.IComparable>介面若要能夠與每個索引鍵的比較。

trans-unit.source: You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多個項目與索引鍵，但不含對應的索引鍵的項目將不會排序，您可以排序。

trans-unit.source: You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多個索引鍵項目，比無法排序如此一來，這會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料分割數目超過 2 * 記錄<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `keys`.
trans-unit.target: 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`keys`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to sort two associated arrays where the first array contains the keys and the second array contains the values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何排序兩個相關聯的陣列，其中的第一個陣列包含的索引鍵，而第二個陣列包含的值。

trans-unit.source: Sorts are done using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order.
trans-unit.target: 完成排序使用預設比較子和自訂比較子，會反轉排序順序。

trans-unit.source: Note that the result might vary depending on the current <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，結果可能會有所不同目前<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keys" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="items" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="items" /> is not <see langword="null" />, and the length of <paramref name="keys" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="items" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而且 <paramref name="keys" /> 的長度大於 <paramref name="items" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: One or more elements in the <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的一或多個元素不會實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array to sort.
trans-unit.target: 要排序的一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: The implementation to use when comparing elements.
trans-unit.target: 比較項目時所要使用的實作。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" /> to use the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each element.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> 表示會使用每個項目的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，排序一維 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 中的元素。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null`, each element of `array` must implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`，每個項目`array`必須實作<xref:System.IComparable>介面中的項目比較能夠`array`。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料分割數目超過 2 * 記錄<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes predefined <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementations listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 包含預先定義<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>實作如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Implementation
trans-unit.target: 實作

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Compares any two objects, but performs a case-insensitive comparison of strings.
trans-unit.target: 比較任何兩個物件，但是執行不區分大小寫的字串比較。

trans-unit.source: Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 使用目前文化特性的排序慣例來比較任意兩個物件。

trans-unit.source: Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 比較任意兩個物件所使用的排序慣例的文化特性而異。

trans-unit.source: Compares two objects of type `T` by using the type's default sort order.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個物件的型別`T`使用類型的預設排序順序。

trans-unit.source: You can also support custom comparisons by providing an instance of your own <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementation to the `comparer` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以藉由提供您自己的執行個體來支援自訂比較<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>實作`comparer`參數。

trans-unit.source: The example does this by defining a `ReverseComparer` class that reverses the default sort order for instances of a type and performs case-insensitive string comparison.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會藉由定義`ReverseComparer`反轉的預設排序順序的類別類型的執行個體和執行不區分大小寫字串的比較。

trans-unit.source: The following example sorts the values in a string arrayby using the default comparer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會排序中使用預設比較子字串 arrayby 的值。

trans-unit.source: It also defines a custom <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementation named `ReverseComparer` that reverses an object's default sort order while performing a case-insensitive string comparison.
trans-unit.target: 它也會定義自訂<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>實作名為`ReverseComparer`，反轉執行不區分大小寫字串比較物件的預設排序順序。

trans-unit.source: Note that the output might vary depending on the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，輸出可能會根據目前文化特性而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, and one or more elements in <paramref name="array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，而且 <paramref name="array" /> 中的一個或多個元素沒有實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <paramref name="comparer" /> caused an error during the sort.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 的實作在排序期間造成錯誤。

trans-unit.source: For example, <paramref name="comparer" /> might not return 0 when comparing an item with itself.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在將項目與其本身比較時，<paramref name="comparer" /> 可能不會傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4 和舊版使用快速排序演算法。

trans-unit.source: Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an <see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" /> exception, and throws an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> exception to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 快速排序識別無效的比較子，在某些情況下，排序作業擲回<see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" />例外狀況，並擲回<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />例外狀況至呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，很可能擲回的先前排序作業<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />不會擲回例外狀況，因為插入排序和 heapsort 演算法則不會偵測無效的比較子。

trans-unit.source: For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的情況下，這適用於具有 16 個元素的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the keys to sort.
trans-unit.target: 一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，包含要排序的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the items that correspond to each of the keys in the <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，包含對應至 <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中每個索引鍵的項目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" /> to sort only the <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> 表示只排序 <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> implementation to use when comparing elements.
trans-unit.target: 比較項目時所要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" /> to use the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each element.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> 表示會使用每個項目的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: Sorts a pair of one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，根據第一個 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的索引鍵，排序一對一維的<see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 物件 (一個物件包含索引鍵，另一個物件包含對應的項目)。

trans-unit.source: Each key in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> has a corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 在每個索引鍵`keys`<xref:System.Array>中有對應的項目`items` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array> is similarly repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵排序期間，在對應的項目時重新定位`items`<xref:System.Array>同樣會重新調整位置。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the `items`<xref:System.Array> is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 因此， `items` <xref:System.Array>根據對應中的索引鍵的排列方式排序`keys` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null`, each key in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> must implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`，每個索引鍵中`keys`<xref:System.Array>必須實作<xref:System.IComparable>介面若要能夠與每個索引鍵的比較。

trans-unit.source: You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多個項目與索引鍵，但不含對應的索引鍵的項目將不會排序，您可以排序。

trans-unit.source: You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多個索引鍵項目，比無法排序如此一來，這會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes predefined <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementations listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 包含預先定義<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>實作如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Implementation
trans-unit.target: 實作

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Compares any two objects, but performs a case-insensitive comparison of strings.
trans-unit.target: 比較任何兩個物件，但是執行不區分大小寫的字串比較。

trans-unit.source: Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 使用目前文化特性的排序慣例來比較任意兩個物件。

trans-unit.source: Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 比較任意兩個物件所使用的排序慣例的文化特性而異。

trans-unit.source: Compares two objects of type `T` by using the type's default sort order.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個物件的型別`T`使用類型的預設排序順序。

trans-unit.source: You can also support custom comparisons by providing an instance of your own <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementation to the `comparer` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以藉由提供您自己的執行個體來支援自訂比較<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>實作`comparer`參數。

trans-unit.source: The example does this by defining an <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementation that reverses the default sort order and performs case-insensitive string comparison.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會藉由定義<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>的實作，保留預設排序順序，並執行不區分大小寫字串的比較。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料分割數目超過 2 * 記錄<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `keys`.
trans-unit.target: 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`keys`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to sort two associated arrays where the first array contains the keys and the second array contains the values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何排序兩個相關聯的陣列，其中的第一個陣列包含的索引鍵，而第二個陣列包含的值。

trans-unit.source: Sorts are done using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order.
trans-unit.target: 完成排序使用預設比較子和自訂比較子，會反轉排序順序。

trans-unit.source: Note that the result might vary depending on the current <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，結果可能會有所不同目前<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keys" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="items" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="items" /> is not <see langword="null" />, and the length of <paramref name="keys" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="items" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而且 <paramref name="keys" /> 的長度大於 <paramref name="items" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The implementation of <paramref name="comparer" /> caused an error during the sort.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 的實作在排序期間造成錯誤。

trans-unit.source: For example, <paramref name="comparer" /> might not return 0 when comparing an item with itself.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在將項目與其本身比較時，<paramref name="comparer" /> 可能不會傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, and one or more elements in the <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，而且 <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的一或多個元素不會實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4 和舊版使用快速排序演算法。

trans-unit.source: Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an <see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" /> exception, and throws an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> exception to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 快速排序識別無效的比較子，在某些情況下，排序作業擲回<see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" />例外狀況，並擲回<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />例外狀況至呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previouslythrew <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> will not throw an exception, becausethe insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，很可能的排序作業該 previouslythrew<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />不會擲回例外狀況，因為插入排序和 heapsort 演算法則不會偵測無效的比較子。

trans-unit.source: For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的情況下，這適用於具有 16 個元素的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to sort.
trans-unit.target: 要排序的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the range to sort.
trans-unit.target: 要排序之範圍的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the range to sort.
trans-unit.target: 區段中要排序的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in a range of elements in a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each element of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的每個元素的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 實作，排序一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中某個元素範圍內的元素。

trans-unit.source: Each element within the specified range of elements in `array` must implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目指定的範圍內的每個項目`array`必須實作<xref:System.IComparable>介面中的項目比較能夠`array`。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to sort the values in an <xref:System.Array> using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何排序值<xref:System.Array>使用預設比較子和自訂比較子，會反轉排序順序。

trans-unit.source: Note that the result might vary depending on the current <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，結果可能會有所不同目前<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than the lower bound of <paramref name="array" />.

<paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to sort two associated arrays where the first array contains the keys and the second array contains the values.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何排序兩個相關聯的陣列，其中的第一個陣列包含的索引鍵，而第二個陣列包含的值。

trans-unit.source: Sorts are done using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order.
trans-unit.target: 完成排序使用預設比較子和自訂比較子，會反轉排序順序。

trans-unit.source: Note that the result might vary depending on the current <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，結果可能會有所不同目前<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keys" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="items" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than the lower bound of <paramref name="keys" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 <paramref name="keys" /> 的下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="items" /> is not <see langword="null" />, and the length of <paramref name="keys" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="items" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而且 <paramref name="keys" /> 的長度大於 <paramref name="items" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="length" /> do not specify a valid range in the <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="length" /> 未指定 <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的有效範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="items" /> is not <see langword="null" />, and <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="length" /> do not specify a valid range in the <paramref name="items" /><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，且 <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="length" /> 未指定 <paramref name="items" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的有效範圍。

trans-unit.source: One or more elements in the <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的一或多個元素不會實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to sort.
trans-unit.target: 要排序的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the range to sort.
trans-unit.target: 要排序之範圍的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the range to sort.
trans-unit.target: 區段中要排序的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> implementation to use when comparing elements.
trans-unit.target: 比較項目時所要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" /> to use the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each element.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> 表示會使用每個項目的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in a range of elements in a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，排序一維 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 中元素範圍內的元素。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null`, each element within the specified range of elements in `array` must implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`，每個項目中的項目指定的範圍內`array`必須實作<xref:System.IComparable>介面中的項目比較能夠`array`。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes predefined <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementations listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 包含預先定義<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>實作如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Implementation
trans-unit.target: 實作

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Compares any two objects, but performs a case-insensitive comparison of strings.
trans-unit.target: 比較任何兩個物件，但是執行不區分大小寫的字串比較。

trans-unit.source: Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 使用目前文化特性的排序慣例來比較任意兩個物件。

trans-unit.source: Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 比較任意兩個物件所使用的排序慣例的文化特性而異。

trans-unit.source: Compares two objects of type `T` by using the type's default sort order.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個物件的型別`T`使用類型的預設排序順序。

trans-unit.source: You can also support custom comparisons by providing an instance of your own <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementation to the `comparer` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以藉由提供您自己的執行個體來支援自訂比較<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>實作`comparer`參數。

trans-unit.source: The example does this by defining a `ReverseComparer` class that reverses the default sort order for instances of a type and performs case-insensitive string comparison.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會藉由定義`ReverseComparer`反轉的預設排序順序的類別類型的執行個體和執行不區分大小寫字串的比較。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料分割數目超過 2 * 記錄<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to sort the values in an <xref:System.Array> using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何排序值<xref:System.Array>使用預設比較子和自訂比較子，會反轉排序順序。

trans-unit.source: Note that the result might vary depending on the current <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，結果可能會有所不同目前<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than the lower bound of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 <paramref name="array" /> 的下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="length" /> do not specify a valid range in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="length" /> 未指定 <paramref name="array" /> 中的有效範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The implementation of <paramref name="comparer" /> caused an error during the sort.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 的實作在排序期間造成錯誤。

trans-unit.source: For example, <paramref name="comparer" /> might not return 0 when comparing an item with itself.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在將項目與其本身比較時，<paramref name="comparer" /> 可能不會傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, and one or more elements in <paramref name="array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，而且 <paramref name="array" /> 中的一個或多個元素沒有實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4 和舊版使用快速排序演算法。

trans-unit.source: Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an <see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" /> exception, and throws an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> exception to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 快速排序識別無效的比較子，在某些情況下，排序作業擲回<see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" />例外狀況，並擲回<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />例外狀況至呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，很可能擲回的先前排序作業<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />不會擲回例外狀況，因為插入排序和 heapsort 演算法則不會偵測無效的比較子。

trans-unit.source: For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的情況下，這適用於具有 16 個元素的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the keys to sort.
trans-unit.target: 一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，包含要排序的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the items that correspond to each of the keys in the <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，包含對應至 <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中每個索引鍵的項目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" /> to sort only the <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> 表示只排序 <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the range to sort.
trans-unit.target: 要排序之範圍的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the range to sort.
trans-unit.target: 區段中要排序的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> implementation to use when comparing elements.
trans-unit.target: 比較項目時所要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" /> to use the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each element.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> 表示會使用每個項目的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: Sorts a range of elements in a pair of one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，根據第一個 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的索引鍵，排序一對一維的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 物件中某範圍的元素 (一個物件包含索引鍵，另一個物件包含對應的項目)。

trans-unit.source: Each key in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> has a corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 在每個索引鍵`keys`<xref:System.Array>中有對應的項目`items` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array> is similarly repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵排序期間，在對應的項目時重新定位`items`<xref:System.Array>同樣會重新調整位置。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the `items`<xref:System.Array> is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 因此， `items` <xref:System.Array>根據對應中的索引鍵的排列方式排序`keys` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null`, each key within the specified range of elements in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> must implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`，每個索引鍵的項目中指定的範圍內`keys`<xref:System.Array>必須實作<xref:System.IComparable>介面若要能夠與每個索引鍵的比較。

trans-unit.source: You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多個項目與索引鍵，但不含對應的索引鍵的項目將不會排序，您可以排序。

trans-unit.source: You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多個索引鍵項目，比無法排序如此一來，這會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes predefined <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementations listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 包含預先定義<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>實作如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Implementation
trans-unit.target: 實作

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Compares any two objects, but performs a case-insensitive comparison of strings.
trans-unit.target: 比較任何兩個物件，但是執行不區分大小寫的字串比較。

trans-unit.source: Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 使用目前文化特性的排序慣例來比較任意兩個物件。

trans-unit.source: Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 比較任意兩個物件所使用的排序慣例的文化特性而異。

trans-unit.source: Compares two objects of type `T` by using the type's default sort order.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個物件的型別`T`使用類型的預設排序順序。

trans-unit.source: You can also support custom comparisons by providing an instance of your own <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementation to the `comparer` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以藉由提供您自己的執行個體來支援自訂比較<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>實作`comparer`參數。

trans-unit.source: The example does this by defining a custom <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementation that reverses the default sort order and performs case-insensitive string comparison.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會藉由定義自訂<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>的實作，保留預設排序順序，並執行不區分大小寫字串的比較。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料分割數目超過 2 * 記錄<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to sort two associated arrays where the first array contains the keys and the second array contains the values.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何排序兩個相關聯的陣列，其中的第一個陣列包含的索引鍵，而第二個陣列包含的值。

trans-unit.source: Sorts are done using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order.
trans-unit.target: 完成排序使用預設比較子和自訂比較子，會反轉排序順序。

trans-unit.source: Note that the result might vary depending on the current <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，結果可能會有所不同目前<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keys" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="items" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="items" /> is not <see langword="null" />, and the lower bound of <paramref name="keys" /> does not match the lower bound of <paramref name="items" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，並且 <paramref name="keys" /> 的下限和 <paramref name="items" /> 的下限不相符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="items" /> is not <see langword="null" />, and the length of <paramref name="keys" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="items" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而且 <paramref name="keys" /> 的長度大於 <paramref name="items" /> 的長度。

<paramref name="items" /> is not <see langword="null" />, and <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="length" /> do not specify a valid range in the <paramref name="items" /><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，且 <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="length" /> 未指定 <paramref name="items" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的有效範圍。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 的實作在排序期間造成錯誤。

trans-unit.target: 例如，在將項目與其本身比較時，<paramref name="comparer" /> 可能不會傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, and one or more elements in the <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，而且 <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的一或多個元素不會實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4 和舊版使用快速排序演算法。

trans-unit.source: Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an <see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" /> exception, and throws an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> exception to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 快速排序識別無效的比較子，在某些情況下，排序作業擲回<see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" />例外狀況，並擲回<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />例外狀況至呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，很可能擲回的先前排序作業<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />不會擲回例外狀況，因為插入排序和 heapsort 演算法則不會偵測無效的比較子。

trans-unit.source: For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的情況下，這適用於具有 16 個元素的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to sort.
trans-unit.target: 要排序之以零起始的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in an entire <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface implementation of each element of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的每個元素之 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型介面實作，排序整個 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Each element of `array` must implement the <xref:System.IComparable%601> generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目`array`必須實作<xref:System.IComparable%601>泛型介面中的項目比較能夠`array`。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料分割數目超過 2 * 記錄<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%29> generic method overload and the <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29> generic method overload.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%29>泛型方法的多載而<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29>泛型方法的多載。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, in no particular order.
trans-unit.target: 建立字串陣列，不依特定順序。

trans-unit.source: The array is displayed, sorted, and displayed again.
trans-unit.target: 陣列會顯示、 已排序，並且會再次顯示。

trans-unit.source: The calls to the <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A> and <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A> generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫<xref:System.Array.Sort%2A>和<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A>泛型方法看起來不任何不同於呼叫其非泛型對應項目，因為 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 推斷的第一個引數類型的泛型型別參數的型別。

trans-unit.source: If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要檢查的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，您可以查看呼叫泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29> generic method overload is then used to search for two strings, one that is not in the array and one that is.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29>泛型方法的多載然後來搜尋兩個字串，而非在陣列與其中一個，為。

trans-unit.source: The array and the return value of the <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A> method are passed to the `ShowWhere` generic method, which displays the index value if the string is found, and otherwise the elements the search string would fall between if it were in the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列和傳回值<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A>方法會傳遞至`ShowWhere`泛型的方法，如果找到字串，否則項目搜尋字串會介於陣列中時顯示的索引值。

trans-unit.source: The index is negative if the string is not n the array, so the `ShowWhere` method takes the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) to obtain the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string.
trans-unit.target: 索引是負值，如果字串不是 n 陣列，所以`ShowWhere`方法會採用的位元補數 (~ 運算子，在 C# 和 Visual c + +，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的為-1) 取得第一個元素大於搜尋 stri 清單中的索引ng。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: One or more elements in <paramref name="array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 中的一個或多個元素沒有實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型介面。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-base <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to sort
trans-unit.target: 要排序之以零起始的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> generic interface implementation to use when comparing elements, or <see langword="null" /> to use the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface implementation of each element.
trans-unit.target: 在比較項目時所使用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> 泛型介面實作，或是 <see langword="null" /> 以使用每個項目的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型介面實作。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 泛型介面，排序 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> 中的元素。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null`, each element of `array` must implement the <xref:System.IComparable%601> generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`，每個項目`array`必須實作<xref:System.IComparable%601>泛型介面中的項目比較能夠`array`。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料分割數目超過 2 * 記錄<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overload and the <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overload.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法的多載而<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法的多載。

trans-unit.source: The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer<string>` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer<String^>` in Visual C++) generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例定義的替代的比較子字串，名為`ReverseCompare`，它會實作`IComparer<string>`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中`IComparer<String^>`Visual c + +) 泛型介面。

trans-unit.source: The comparer calls the <xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29> method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high.
trans-unit.target: 比較子的呼叫<xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29>方法，使字串排序高-到-低而不是低到高反轉比較元的順序。

trans-unit.source: The array is displayed, sorted, and displayed again.
trans-unit.target: 陣列會顯示、 已排序，並且會再次顯示。

trans-unit.source: Arrays must be sorted in order to use the <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 必須排序陣列，才能使用<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The calls to the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> and <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>和<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法看起來不任何不同於呼叫其非泛型對應項目，因為 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 推斷的第一個引數類型的泛型型別參數的型別。

trans-unit.source: If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要檢查的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，您可以查看呼叫泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overload is then used to search for two strings, one that is not in the array and one that is.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法的多載然後來搜尋兩個字串，而非在陣列與其中一個，為。

trans-unit.source: The array and the return value of the <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> method are passed to the `ShowWhere` generic method, which displays the index value if the string is found, and otherwise the elements the search string would fall between if it were in the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列和傳回值<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法會傳遞至`ShowWhere`泛型的方法，如果找到字串，否則項目搜尋字串會介於陣列中時顯示的索引值。

trans-unit.source: The index is negative if the string is not n the array, so the `ShowWhere` method takes the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) to obtain the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string.
trans-unit.target: 索引是負值，如果字串不是 n 陣列，所以`ShowWhere`方法會採用的位元補數 (~ 運算子，在 C# 和 Visual c + +，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的為-1) 取得第一個元素大於搜尋 stri 清單中的索引ng。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, and one or more elements in <paramref name="array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，而且 <paramref name="array" /> 中的一個或多個元素沒有實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型介面。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <paramref name="comparer" /> caused an error during the sort.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 的實作在排序期間造成錯誤。

trans-unit.source: For example, <paramref name="comparer" /> might not return 0 when comparing an item with itself.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在將項目與其本身比較時，<paramref name="comparer" /> 可能不會傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Comparison`1" />.
